Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 10, 2015
Author: Ron Johnson
Title: Could ALL the Reviews Be Right?
Body: After careful research and reading many of the reviews, pro and con for these towels I believe, after having them for the past two months, that everyone is correct. Those who said that these towels were plush and softer after each washing are correct. Those who said you can get as good, or better a towel from the big box stores are also correct. Here's my story. I purchased a set and was happy enough with them that two weeks later, I purchased another set of four. Shortly after the second purchase my wife tells me that Sam's Club is selling a towel that's bigger and looks just as good for $6.99. We've purchased towels from the warehouse folk before and they were like trying to dry off with the front door mat, so I wasn't too worried, but said we would get one just to see how it stood up. Here's the stats: The Amazon towels, (i.e. Soft Touch Linen) are made in Turkey under the brand name Chakir Linen. They measure 49 x 26 and weigh 21 ounces. The Sam's Club towel was sold under the brand name Hotel Luxury Reserve is made in India and measures 54 x 28 and weighs 25.5 ounces. This was after both towels were washed at least twice. The Amazon towel feels slightly thicker, the Sam's Club towel feels slightly softer. The only complaint that my wife had about the Sam's Club towel, it has three ribbings at the end whereas the Amazon towel has only one. She said these strips kind of get in the way. So far all towels are holding up pretty good, no fraying, or loose threads.Also, be weary of the "also bought" line. I purchased the "matching" hand towels and wash cloths. Only they weren't really matching, not a big deal, but not even the same brand and, I thought, since I'm buying the bath towels they will no doubt just send the other merchandise with them. No. Got the bath towels on the Prime two day free shipping deal. Waited an extra four, or five days for the rest of the stuff, and paid a pretty good shipping fee for them as well.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 4, 2014
Author: MiamiTechnoLawyer
Title: Great Towel, Outstanding Value 4.5 Stars
Body: I ordered these towels and an Amazon house brand Pinzon Egyptian Cotton 625 gram weight towel set at the same time.  I was very pleased with both products. This towel is slightly softer, and a little heavier/thicker than the 625 gram Pinzon.  While both towels are the same length the Pinzon is 4 inches wider.  The Pinzon is made in Pakistan and the this towel is made in Turkey a country known for terrycloth robes and towels.  Is this this heaviest, softest, nicest towel I have ever seen.  No.  If you visit a high end department store, you can find a thicker, softer towel, by a designer name that is better but it will cost you well over twenty dollars a towel, twice the price of these.  These towels are a superb value at $10.00 each.  This towel be as good or better as any towel you will find in the $15.00 to $20.00 range at Target, Lands End, and the like.  I am at a loss to  explain the handful of one and two star reviews for this product.  If I had to give category grades I would say  Softness A, Weight A, Size B+/A-, Value A+.  I would order this product again without hesitation.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2019
Author: D. G.
Title: Update after 3.5 years of daily use: Still wonderful condition!
Body: Update after 3.5 years of daily use and weekly wash with bleach: Still like new. None has ever unraveled, including the washcloths and hand towels.UPDATE AFTER 2.5 years of daily use and 2 to 3 weekly wash: They are still like new. I never once had to mend a towel, hand towel or washcloth. They kept their shape and look like new. I use bleach in every wash. Really, that’s one of my best purchase regarding durability/price.I have the bath towels, the hand towels and bath mats and washcloth from the same brand. Absolutely zero issues after 1 year of frequent wash.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2015
Author: Brian
Title: Very nice towels for a good price.
Body: These are very nice and heavy towels. They dry excellent and are very soft. I purchased eight of them and washed them all together. In the future if / when I purchase more I will be sure to lessen the load. These towels had an excessive amount of lint and fuzz coming out of the dry cycle. Since then they seem to wash nicely. Everybody in my household fights over the new towels!Update a year later! (12/23/2015)These towels still remain intact and absorb water and dry nicely! I ordered another eight towels, and our year old towels are definitely not as "fluffy" as the new ones, but that is to be expected and are still fantastic towels. Highly recommend these towels for getting as close as you can to a "hotel quality" towel. Love them!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 8, 2019
Author: H. Jones
Title: Not worth $10 a towel! Disappointed.
Body: I am actually shocked that people have given these towels 5 stars.  They are the quality of a $4 towel that would come from Walmart.  They were thin, and definately not "hotel quality" towels. I have included a photo of them when they arrived in the packaging next to my womens size 7 1/2 adidas tennis shoe so you can see exactly how non-fluffy these towels are. Definately not worth $10 a towel.  I was trying to buy online but it looks like I am going to have to head to a department store to find the quality that we like in our home.  These are going back to the seller.  Just wanted to help someone else not make the same mistake that I did!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2016
Author: Amazon Customer
Title: equivalent to a nice hotel or spa quality
Body: Ordered 12 Luxury Hotel & Spa bath towels as well as matching (same brand) 24 face towels, 6 hand towels, and 2 bath mats (44 total towels) on Thursday evening and they arrived on Saturday right before Christmas.  They didn't have any off smells upon arrival and were soft.  I split the laundry into 3 loads using 2 cups of white vinegar (generic brand) for each load and didn't use dryer sheets.  They came out even softer out of the dryer; equivalent to a nice hotel or spa quality.Here's some pics. I included an iron in one so you can put into context how thick the towels are.  Also, as you can see, there were very minimal loose strands that had to be snipped after cleaning all the towels.  Lastly, there was a small palm-sized amount of lint in the dryer's lint screen after every load, which was expected.I'm very happy with the purchase.  The quality, price, and timeliness of delivery deserves 5 stars.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 13, 2015
Author: Mark
Title: would not recommend these towels
Body: These towels fraying just after 2 month of..... would not recommend these towels. I tried to contact Soft Touch Linen and they took no responsibility for their towels quote "you would have to contact Amazon customer service" Take a look at the photo...

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 10, 2015
Author: B. Kellner
Title: I just love them. I want more when I feel like ...
Body: These are so soft & feel luxurious to me. They are absorbent, too. I just love them.  I want more when I feel like I can spend the money. I don't like spending $10 for 1 towel, but these are totally worth it. At some point, I want the wash cloths & hand towels, too.Follow Up: Ordered some more. Didn't get the same design towels. They look the same, except these that I got today have a ribbed design on the ends. I hope they are at least the same quality. I actually ordered these right after I wrote the review above & got a phone case instead. I called, & they sent these out the next day. As long as the quality is the same, I guess it doesn't matter too much to me about the slight design difference. :(

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2017
Author: Madeline P
Title: So fluffy and soft!
Body: I received an Amazon gift card for Christmas and I decided to use it on some nice luxury bath towels (since I wouldn't normally purchase them myself).I decided on these because they had a lot of positive reviews. They were delivered right to my door step from Amazon and I was immediately impressed when I opened the package.After opening, I washed these in cold water on the gentle cycle with Simply Tide, and dried on low heat with a couple of downy dryer sheets (no excessive lint like other reviewers have posted). I folded and put away in my linen closet and the quality is immediately visible compared to my old towels. Three of these towels vs 3 hands towels AND 3 bath towels.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 15, 2018
Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Little white hairs everywhere.
Body: Got white crap all over my clothes and body whenever I first dried off. Now it's over everything.You're not only spending money for the product, but to inflict pain on yourself for having to clean up after it.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 3, 2015
Author: Leelo V.
Title: Very disappointed !
Body: Very disappointed as I got absolutely different dark ^ ugly colors I never ordered.Look what I ordered and the result is on the photo!Real disappointed!Will return these ugly color towels back.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 7, 2018
Author: Cynthia
Title: You get what you pay for....
Body: These should not be marketed as luxury towels. They are extremely, extremely thin and not plush at all. Very light-weight and are more suitable as hair towels in a salon, given how thin they are. I dropped them off at the local UPS to return them within an hour of receiving them.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 25, 2017
Author: K. H.
Title: Thumbs down.
Body: I will preface this by saying I am extremely picky about my towels. I purchased the set of 4 in plum. Color WAS nice, until it started fading after a few washes. They also shrunk about an inch after the first wash and lost their shape - they're already small to begin with. Onwards I go to find a new set of towels I actually like!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 29, 2014
Author: J
Title: Exactly as described
Body: These towels are wonderful. We had not bought good towels since 2000 and I noticed how rough they felt so ordered these towels.  I will probably be ordering more.  A couple of years ago my husband bought a couple of cheap towels at a big box store and they immediately roughened up and did not absorb well.  Don't waste your money: buy these instead!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 25, 2014
Author: Barbara Curran
Title: Large, fluffy, stark white towels
Body: This is my first review. I had to write my positive expierience with these towels. They are very absorbent and  good quality. They became much fluffier after my first wash and dry. Great for the price. I highly recommend these towels

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 16, 2015
Author: Rita
Title: It was terrible. Also strings coming out all over
Body: After 1 washing there was an excessive amount of lint all over the machine. It was terrible. Also strings coming out all over.  The photos are from after the drier. The washer was much worse. It left much more lint. Do not recommend these towel.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 21, 2014
Author: kathy eldridge
Title: disappointed
Body: They were not soft and fluffy like I thought they would be. Strings are coming off the  bottom of the towels

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 1, 2015
Author: Amazon Buyer
Title: it dries nicely, it's an adequate size
Body: I'm wondering if anyone else who bought these towels have had the same experience I've had. After drying off with the towel, the bottom of the tub/shower is covered with a bunch of lint from the towel. I've used the same red towel 3 times now, and it's still shedding!! I've even taken the towel outside to shake it a few times before taking my shower, but that didn't help. It's just a pain wiping the bottom of the tub with paper towels - I don't want all of that lint going down the drain and building up, causing drainage problems. I'll have to see if the other towels give me the same problem.Otherwise, it dries nicely, it's an adequate size, and has an attractive appearance when hanging on the towel bar.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 5, 2015
Author: Lydia
Title: Excellent towels; lots o' lint!
Body: OK, I get why everyone is upset about the lint thing.  For the first 6-8 weeks, these things left lint like a joke.  I would wipe the steam off the mirror when I got out of the shower, and it would leave a solid layer of lint.  Then, after I shaved, I would have so much lint on my face that I looked like Santa Clause!  When we ran them through the drier, there was more lint than the trap could hold, and I was a little worried about a fire.But we have been buying these thick, absorbent, luxury hotel towels for years, and this just seems to be a package deal.I'm not sure why, but the thick, absorbent, and reasonably priced ones always seem to start out this way.  If it bothers you that much and you're not an environmentalist, you could just wash them about 20 times before using them...

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2014
Author: Dawn A.
Title: One Star
Body: Fell apart at seams in one wash!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 9, 2014
Author: Jeffrey W. Brake
Title: Great Towels
Body: First, we do not like to buy towels that we are not able to do  a feel test before buying.  We did buy these based on the most recent reviews on this product.  We have had these towels for two weeks and they are GREAT!Beware that when you do receive this shipment, the towels do not look or feel very good but after a washing cycle, we are impressed with the softness, durability, and quality of these towels.  Also, these towels dry quickly after each use.  We recommend.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 11, 2014
Author: Stanford Fleming
Title: Great Towels But Pricey
Body: These are fantastic, well-made, absorbent towels. I don't see any fraying, shedding, or loose threads after multiple uses and launderings. They do take a bit longer than other towels to dry, but this is because they're thicker and more absorbent than most other towels. There are two drawbacks. First, this style seems to be available only in white, and you'll see every stain that can't be laundered out. Second, the price seems a bit high. If you're willing to pay, though, you'll end up with a superior, soft, absorbent towel that I recommend without reservation.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 29, 2014
Author: Jason E. Maggard
Title: Great towels
Body: Wow. These towels are great. We had the usual assortment of bargain Target towels that we picked up for $6-8 a piece a few years ago. Some towels from Ikea. Some we paid more for from Macy's. They never left you feeling quite dry, and the towel was soaked after use. The first time I used on of these I was dry as a bone, and the towel was still dry to the touch.When I was my Shorkie, he could drench towels like no one's business. Usually took two to get him dry(ish). These towels get him drier and still have some "thirsty" to spare even after drying my little furball.Are they "Luxurious"? Meh. For $10 a towel, these WORK. They compare favorably with the towels we used at the Nemacolin, a 5 star resort. They aren't as soft and fluffy as my Mom's $30 a towel pastel whatevers. It's a plain white towel that works like a charm. As a guy who favors function over fashion, these are perfect.I'm back for 3 more sets, and the old towels are getting cut into rags. Yeah, I like 'em.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 10, 2014
Author: Lori Orr
Title: super soft
Body: I looked on a label of one of our favorite towels we already had and this was it.  We love these towels they are soft and feel amazing with you dry off. You feel like you are being pampered with them.  I also got 12 of the hand towels they are the same feel.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 21, 2014
Author: Michael Johnson
Title: NOT SOFT AND VERY THIN
Body: Don't let the description or picture fool you.  These towels were very thin and not soft at all.  In fact they are very rough against the skin and being so thin they are not absorbant either.  I really dislike when online retailers lie to sell a product.  The word Luxury should not even be a part of the name associated with this product.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 8, 2014
Author: Rawr
Title: Lint, lint, lint
Body: The towels are pretty soft and would be ok, but they throw off lint like crazy. After 3 times in the washer AND the dryer they STILL leave white lint all over my body and on the bathroom floor. Lots and lots of lint. Bottom line: fairly soft, marginally fluffy, and tons of lint. Not luxurious at all.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 17, 2020
Author: C.K.
Title: Excessive Lint
Body: Was super disappointed about these towels. They came in and I really liked them at first. They were soft and thick. However, after washing them and drying them countless times (and using all my laundry change in the process) I cannot for the life of me get rid of the excess lint. They didn't seem to dry very well either. Tbh, I've never had a problem with lint this bad when it came to towels as I have with these. I can't even dry anything without a layer of lint on my body or in the air so that it makes me sneeze and irritates my asthma. I even got 2 packs of 4. Not sure if it's just my experience or what.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 8, 2014
Author: JoeLew
Title: Standard quality towels at Superior Quality Pricing.
Body: Absolutely way overpriced! I found better towels in Target for half the price. Don't waste your money on these ultra thick towels.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2019
Author: Jason
Title: Not thick and luxurious!
Body: Thin as the cheapest you could buy at Walmart. When they first came in, i thought the bag was vacuum sealed.The only good thing I can say about them is they're soft.Stay away, false advertising!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 7, 2014
Author: Maher Daoudi
Title: Just "OK" - Not Luxury
Body: I don't get the reviews, these are just "OK" - you can get better quality at Target. I had higher expectations, they are slightly more fluffy than the other inexpensive towels we bought at walmart. I washed them several times since we bought them, they did fluff up slightly after first wash as others mentioned on this board, however they are no where near the "Luxury" quality and thickness I expected.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2014
Author: Sars J.
Title: One Star
Body: These towels look cheap and are thin. The reviews missed the mark on this one. Promptly returned.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 1, 2014
Author: Laura Schroeder
Title: Looks like its been damaged during production
Body: soft , but very thin.  Ad is misleading.  I took out one towel so far and it is tattered in the middle.  Looks like its been damaged during production.  I will send these back, and I never so that

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 30, 2014
Author: Energy drink guru
Title: good towels
Body: Very soft good quality I will be buying more. Did I mention they are white and make my butt sparkle.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 19, 2020
Author: Jen
Title: Affordable Luxury
Body: These towels are incredibly soft and lush feeling.  We looked for comparable towels for our new sauna at some of the big box retailers, but couldn't justify paying $20+ for a single towel, so we took a gamble and bought this set.  We followed the instructions on the site to soak the towels in cold water for 12 hours.  We left them in the pre-soak setting in our washer overnight.  We didn't use any detergents or softeners as advised.  And they were noticeably fluffier when we pulled them out of the dryer.  We also love the fact that they don't use any harmful chemicals.  As long as these hold up for some period of time, we are some happy campers.The gray towels are the ones that we purchased.  The 4 gray towels are noticeably more plush than the 5 white towels stacked next to them.  Incredibly satisfied with this purchase, and will most certainly purchase again.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 1, 2015
Author: CoolGorilla
Title: Soft against skin
Body: Soft, big, simple design. Came folded in a stack. May not look plush but feels like it.

Date: Reviewed in Canada on January 6, 2017
Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Quality issues.
Body: Poor quality.  2 towels out of the set of 4 have begun to unravel after 1 wash.  Never even had chance to use.  Was a gift sent to family, so very disappointing.  Buyer be aware!

Date: Reviewed in Mexico on May 23, 2018
Author: teresita
Title: No compren estas toallas es una estafa!
Body: Se ven grandes y gruesas las toallas en la foto y la descripción dice Luxury hotel & spa towel y sinceramente son las toallas más corriente que he visto en mi visa... debería de sacarlas de Amazon ya que perjudica la imagen del market place.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 6, 2015
Author: Klahanie
Title: These are fantastic towels and even better with color.
Body: I love these towels. They are thick, absorbent, and high quality towels. I thought I would try them and dye them in colors that I choose. They take the dye very well so I will be buying more and adding more colors.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 8, 2016
Author: Dave
Title: WORST TOWELS EVER!!!!
Body: What a mess!!!!  Rating was good so I bought the towels.  They arrived after a month from China.  So much for Turkish Towels!!Picture looked thick and luxurious.  Actual fact is thin and tiny.  Horrible!  Perhaps fine as cleaning rags.  So I got a return label.  WELL I HAVE TO RETURN THEM TO CHINA AT MY EXPENSE.  The description says "Ships from and sold by Amazon.com".  What a crock!  DON'T EVEN THINK ABOUT BUYING THIS JUNK.  I am a long time Prime member and buy a huge volume from Amazon.  Never had such a horrible experience before.  So how do I go up the chain to complain and get my money back?  Have no idea.  Amazon site doesn't seem to provide for that!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2014
Author: joe growall
Title: One Star
Body: Average motel 6 towels not luxury after the first washing the lint traps were full.

Date: Reviewed in Mexico on January 8, 2019
Author: Carlos Antonio
Title: Excelente compra
Body: Excelentes toallas, grandes y muy suaves. Secan perfecto y no son tan delgadas como comentan, tienen una textura genial; aparte el precio estuvo de 10, menos de $300 por las 4 toallas. De las mejores compras que he realizado en Amazon.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2019
Author: Julian Lee
Title: Too much lints!
Body: You will probably have to laundry this towel more than 5 times to remove all lint coming out of it. I was not smart enough to put my clothes with this towel. Also, you can feel the lints on your body after use it. Be aware.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 13, 2015
Author: Mema
Title: Best towels ever!
Body: I must say these are the best towels I have ever owned. They washed and dried great the first time without lots of lint like other towels I have owned in the past. With first use they were very nice, soft and very absorbent. These are super high quality towels! I believe these towels will last for many years of use. Love them!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 9, 2014
Author: Charles
Title: Average size and thickness, nothing special
Body: Not nearly as large or thick as a real bath towel from a good hotel. It's not very absorbent either--I've had much better. It's overpriced considering the description compared to the reality, but it's not worth the time sending them back.If you are really looking for a large, thick, luxurious towel like you would find in a Four Season's spa, forget it. Look elsewhere.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2019
Author: Andy J. Peterson
Title: Great product
Body: These are great, great towels.  We needed to replace some towels and agonized about what to get.  The ones that we were replacing we purchased at an upscale score, but they did not last.  We looked at the reviews and, of course, they are mixed.  But, I can tell you, from our experience, that these are great, great towels.  They feel like towels from a posh hotel, they have worn well, looking as good now as the day we bought them, and they are soft and thick, just as advertised.  You can't beat them or the price.  Buy with confidence!!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 22, 2016
Author: Girl_Style
Title: Don't last long...
Body: —UPDATE—After half of a rental season I have to say these aren't what I expected. They have lost all softness and are now scratchy and thin.I am very picky about laundry so I do all of the rental laundry myself. I regularly wash the towels in a load of vinegar to remove any lingering smells or body oils and then use TIDE free & clear. I have bleached them a few times due to dark stains or makeup and rewashed with vinegar afterwards and dry on medium-high with dryer balls.They have been washed & used about 10-12 times and I am no longer comfortable placing them in the rental since they are so thin and scratchy. Will be looking elsewhere for towel supplies.—ORIGINAL REVIEW—We have had these for about 6 months in a vacation rental property. I can't review their longevity because this is the first season of use and we are just opening up the property for booking. However, they have been washed a hand full of time and have held up with no loose threads or loss to softness. I recommend that you wash them right after they arrive with a cup full of vinegar and use wool balls in the drier to decrease amount of drying time needed (the less dry time to fluffier they stay=less lint loss) as well as increase softness due to tumble actin of the balls. I am impressed with how very soft these towels are, they absorb water very well and dry within an hour when hung on a towel bar.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 13, 2014
Author: Dax
Title: Very poor quality. I would not recommend this product
Body: After using these towels a few times, I've noticed that they are literally coming apart. Small pieces and chunks of cotton from the towels are sticking to other clothes that the towels are washed with and when drying off you can see small swabs of cotton pulling apart from the towel.Very poor quality. I would not recommend this product.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 5, 2020
Author: Gabi
Title: Not what is shown
Body: The towels came into today and it takes two of them to make one in the photo. The colours aren't vibrant, and you can see through them in places. Totally do not recommend.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 29, 2016
Author: V D
Title: These are THE TOWELS you've been looking for!
Body: I've had so many cheap towels come and go through my life and my bathroom. I've always been searching for that magic combination of comfort, durability, and drying power that the towels used to have back at home when I was a kid. Why is it that when I'm an adult, all of my stuff is never quite as nice as it was when mom and dad were taking care of everything?Then I found these towels. They cost a little more than something you'd buy in a department store or something, but it's definitely worth it. I actually had these in my cart on Amazon for quite a while before one day I decided to take the plunge. I was worried about spending this much on towels only to have them show up and not be all that different from the other towels I've got.I am so glad I got them. The difference between these towels and the towels before is gigantic. I love these towels. The reassuring feeling you get after a long day, then taking a shower, and wrapping yourself in these soft voluminous towels is like no other. I love these towels!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 24, 2015
Author: Esoteric
Title: Good Quality & Great Value - 4.5 stars
Body: I originally purchased these towels together with a set of hand towels from the same manufacturer about a year ago from Amazon. After a year of usage, I am highly satisfied with the quality of the towels -- enough to recommend them for my parents who needed new towels recently. Unlike towels that I have previously purchased from well-known department stores, these do not fray after months of usage and washing. If you use a small amount of bleach when washing these towels (together with a laundry detergent for whites), they will also maintain a fairly brilliant white color.I would say these towels are as good as (if not better) than towels you'd expect to find at a 5 star hotel. They are soft to the touch, they feel comfortable on the body, and they dry both skin and hair quite effectively. They are not overly plush, nor are they too thin.If I were to mention one minor caveat, it would be the size of these towels. Be advised that they do shrink when you first wash them (I would say about 10% shrinkage is typical). As far as bath towels go, larger is better, and while these towels are sufficiently large enough to get you get you dry after a bath or shower, it would have been better if they were a bit larger.Having said that, these towels are still a great value for the quality of product that you will receive. If you are a new homeowner, newly married couple or just in the market for new towels for your household, you can stop fretting the decision and go with these towels. After a year of usage, would purchase these towels again without hesitation.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 8, 2014
Author: JMW
Title: Very Good Quality and a Great Buy!
Body: We have a vacation rental so we go through a lot of towels. Since our guests often bleach out our colored towels with various hair and face products,  I thought I'd try some white towels. These had some good reviews and were a great price. Once washed, they are soft and fluffy. I don't know how absorbent they are since they are not for our personal use but they are a very good quality towel and a good buy. I will be ordering more today. I do wish the washing instructions were on the actual towels and not just the note it came with.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 27, 2020
Author: DogMonkey66
Title: terrible
Body: I can't even use these. It feels like you're just rubbing a wet cloth on yourself like immediately.  NO absorbency at all. These completely suck. Even after washing like 4 times they're basically useless. GDI!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 26, 2017
Author: Mrkoffee
Title: Bed and Breakfast Guests LOVE these....but
Body: I have an AirBnB and these are the only towels i use.  Guests love them... very soft, fluffy.  I do have a question for the maker or other user of these 100% cotton towels.  I am getting small round orange/yellow stains that will not come out.  I have tried Clorox, Hydrogen Peroxide, pretreating with Spray and Wash, Tide Free and Clear Detergent, and NOTHING is working to get these stains out.  I have narrowed it down to some makeup removers and acne cleansers as well as some whitening toothpaste have a Benzol Peroxide in them which seems to the be cause of the stain.. towels are ruined once these stains set in.  Any help would be greatly appreciated.  I have about 4 dozen of these towels and half are now unusable.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 9, 2019
Author: Amazon Customer
Title: threds are loose from towel after just opening package of 4
Body: I opend the package of 4 and pulled one towel out.  I don't have a great camera but there's threads already coming loose and sticking out from the towel.  I have never posted pictures when I have returns, but fed up with poor quality items when description and prices say otherwise.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 3, 2016
Author: Steven P Miller
Title: These are great, no nonsense towels
Body: These are great, no nonsense towels.  I bought them to replace some over-priced ones from Restoration Hardware that are too thick and have begun to smell weird.  These towels were so affordable and are a perfect weight and size.  Admittedly, I was not looking for the perfect towel.  Just one that looks nice, feels soft, absorbent and not awkwardly large or thick, but substantive enough dry me off and dry appropriately while being affordable.  These towels are just what I was looking for and I plan on purchasing more.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 9, 2016
Author: Lorijchris
Title: Will definitely buy them again...
Body: I waited until I had these towels several months to write this review. These towels have proven to be very good quality. Yes, they produce extra lint after drying, in the beginning, but that's to be expected. They are very fluffy even still and very absorbent. They are quality made and have no defects nor are they showing any signs of wear. I love them and will definitely buy them again.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 7, 2016
Author: matt merton
Title: Purchased towels that I really liked but when I used the Buy It Again feature ...
Body: Purchased towels that I really liked but when I used the Buy It Again feature thinking I would get exact same item, I got some thin cheap towels.  The worst part was when I saw much nicer towels in Wal Mart for cheaper.  Junk, do not waste your money on these.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 12, 2017
Author: Cajun Sensation
Title: Not the best quality
Body: Not high quality.  These towels developed holes and frays after just a few months with low usage.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2015
Author: A
Title: which are holding up better than these
Body: Started to fray and the edges unfolded after just one wash. I returned them and bought martex bath towels instead, which are holding up better than these, however they fray slightly as well.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2015
Author: HPN Laforet
Title: Wash first, THEN enjoy
Body: I was almost going to give this 1 star for all the lint the towels gave off. Then I realized -- nope! The plastic bag it comes in actually tells you to wash before first use (and don't wash with other things, just the towels alone). Yes, there WILL be a lot of lint on the first cycle, but after that you get excellent towels. I've used them for almost two months now and haven't had any issues with them. If I need more towels I'll be ordering another pack of these.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 31, 2020
Author: FG
Title: Holy lint batman!
Body: I got these and I'm washing them. I had to clean out the washing machine of all the lint . Now I'm checking the lint trap every 10 minutes to clean it out! I hope this is a 1 time thing. They are soft and seem absorbent, but if they shed so bad, they are kind of useless . I'll update after using.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 30, 2015
Author: Thule
Title: Five Stars
Body: Incredibly soft and luxurious for a fraction of the price of Egyptian cotton towels!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 30, 2014
Author: Suzanne in Montana
Title: Nice towels
Body: I bought these for guests to use for our hot tub. They are a pretty good size for most everyone. There was a lot of lint in the lint screen the first time I washed them. However, the second time, I had to use bleach as a guest got blood on one of them. I spot sprayed the blood stain and washed in hot water with bleach and you can't even tell which one had blood on it. They came out nice and soft and the lint was minimal the second time around. They are nice and thick also.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 25, 2016
Author: DA BEAR
Title: GARBAGE PRODUCT. SEE ABOVE!
Body: SELLERS ARE A ROYAL PAIN. EMAILS EVERY DAY FOR SA REVIEW. LEAVE ME ALONE. I HATE THESE TOWELS, VERY ROUGH. I USED THEM TO SAND MY WOOD FLOOR THEN I TOSSED THEM IN THE TRASH.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 29, 2014
Author: Gabby
Title: Really Nice
Body: These are very nice towels. Thick enough to wick away the water and feel nice on the skin, thin enough to dry totally when hanging on the hook. They have been washed and dried more than once. Washed first time before using and quite a bit of lint in the dryer filter. Since the first wash, very little shedding. This was an excellent purchase for the price.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 17, 2014
Author: Kimberley
Title: Does not dry you off and are much smaller than expected.
Body: Does not dry you off and are much smaller than expected. / If you ate looking for a soft white towel these are cute for decoration maybe but as far as every day use don’t waste your $.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 24, 2020
Author: Kevin Garcia
Title: Not bad, not great.
Body: These towels definitely look thick and absorbent from the pictures used to display and market them, and even though they aren’t thin by any means, they could use some additional fabric.I compared them in pictures with towels I bought at Walmart. (in the picture: Walmart ones are dark. These amazon ones are light)The Walmart ones are $7.89 each, with these being $11.25 each. Both towels are 100% cotton, but you can clearly see that the Walmart towels are somewhat thicker, and definitely longer stranded than the counterpart.I remember a time where Amazon would give you the best deals that you could never find in stores and provided the greatest bang for your buck. I’m starting to see that flip around lately. Hopefully amazon gets back to their roots

Date: Reviewed in Mexico on September 2, 2020
Author: Cliente de Amazon
Title: Muy buenas toallas, pero...
Body: Las toallas son sumamente suaves y absorbentes. Sin embargo, se encogieron un poco después de la primera lavada...

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2021
Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Completely misleading title and description
Body: Completely misleading title and description. Once again it’s so important to take into context  what someone’s background is when they are reviewing items online. There is nothing luxurious or thick about these towels at all. They are a plain old ordinary bath towel. I am upper middle class and have three kids. I do not shop at Walmart but we do shop at target and these towels are no better than anything you could find it either of those stores.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 4, 2021
Author: D. D. Navin
Title: Surprising quality!
Body: Opening the package, these towels were fairly thin & stiff and my immediate reaction was not optimistic. However, after laundering them, I have changed my mind 180 degrees - these towels are great! After just 1 wash/dry. they became soft, fluffy and absorbent and without leaving a mess in the lint filter or on the wool balls - another surprise. And now, after several washings, they have maintained their shape as well as their softness. Will recommend these to anyone wishing to purchase a spa-like product without the spa-like price.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 10, 2017
Author: Heather Wood
Title: That's not cool at all
Body: So I got these new towels and they seem hefty and plush. I washed them before using, and had to cut off strings -- after the FIRST washing! That's not cool at all. But now since I washed them, I guess they're mine. Not sure I'd buy again but will wait and see how long these ones last.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 10, 2016
Author: @TheBakedNurse
Title: Love
Body: Wow. I've always bought cheap towels from Walmart or Target. But I am moving into a new house and needed to get all new everything.Towels are something we/most of us use on a daily basis. You don't think much of them until you step out of the shower and wrap a scratchy or worn out towel around you, or worse yet, one that continually leaves lint alllllll over your body.I wanted to upgrade and buy nice towels for one in my life. These aren't cheap (to me) so I was hesitant to click the buy button...until I realized if I were ordering a couple pizzas for my family I'd think nothing of the cost...and a pizza doesn't last buy a day, or two if your lucky. It's funny how we compare or are hesitant to spend money, at times, on quality items we use on a daily basis vs handing over the debit card for a really good (and expensive) dinner out with your family.OK. So these towels are just awesome. I ordered them in white. My whole family have been excited to use these. They are incredibly soft, absorbent and dry quickly. They are not too thick or thin, and the size is perfect. I didn't want towels the size of a beach towel but certainly not small either. These wrap around perfectly, even for my 6'2" muscular husband.I'm never go back to cheap towels again. I've already bought another set of these and plan to buy 2 more sets next month.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 4, 2014
Author: steven
Title: Seem to be good quality with minimal lint after first two washings
Body: Towels are holding up well after 6-8 washings.  Seem to be good quality with minimal lint after first two washings.  Only complaint is they don't seem to be as absorbent as our other towels.  I was hoping it was manufacturing process and after several washings it would get better.  So far it hasn't.  They do absorb but not like my other towels.

Date: Reviewed in Canada on January 24, 2021
Author: James C
Title: Just a regular Towel
Body: Even after following the instructions of soaking in cold water and air drying they just seem like regular decent towels. Don't think they are worth the price paid but they are functional just not "luxury". Would not buy again.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2019
Author: RandomReader
Title: Excellent Choice!
Body: Years ago I was able to easily discern high quality towels that lasted for years but now a days it is almost impossible.  The last batch I bought actually had thread that over time shrunk in the dryer.  So this time, I read reviews and rankings on different towels and ordered “sample” batches before committing to three bathroom setups.  After checking out a number of options, the “Luxury Hotel & Spa Bath Towel 100% Genuine Turkish Cotton, 27" x 54" , Set of 4, White” was decided the top towel option by our family.  They are soft, absorb water quickly, dry within a reasonable time, have beautiful color options, and are affordable.  I have only washed and dried the “test” purchase set of 4, white 27” x 54” towels once but so far they are still wonderfully soft and thick with no other visible problems.  I just placed my first whole bathroom setup order; including “makeup” towels for teenagers who have been known to ruin other towels by staining or discoloring them.  Wow!  I didn’t know such a thing was an option.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 8, 2020
Author: Boomer
Title: Great for a few months
Body: This month will mark a year since I purchased these towels for my wife. I hold off on reviews for towels, sheets etc until about this time to see how they do after long term wash and wear. These towels simply don't hold up. Was very pleased when I got them, soft and fluffy as described and even six months of weekly washings later they were in good shape. Then they gradually started losing their softness and shrinking until they are basically Walmart quality.You get what you pay for I guess, so if you don't mind the short lifespan of these then go ahead and try these. I'll be looking for some higher quality towels

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 19, 2019
Author: Z
Title: I do not recommend
Body: I want to know what are these good reviews all about!Has anyone ever had a good towel or I wasn’t lucky enough to get a fair product?Pros; These towels are lightweight, plushy, and a reasonable size!Cons; my entire life is mixed with white lint, and they are contagious!!!There is nothing left that doesn’t have lint on it. Including my hair and my body after I use these!Since they came dirty with some brown spots on them, I had to wash them twice before using them.But lints didn’t go away!!!After washing them, I realized that they are not as white as they wer e at first, and they look old after 2 wash, and 1 use!!Tried to return them but there is no option on returning these on amazon. So I have to call it in!Watch out for your money, your time, and the hassle of returning these.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 27, 2015
Author: M. Starr
Title: Great for the price
Body: A while back we bought some fancy shmancy towels, but they took forever to dry and we only have one towel rack in our little apartment. Then we switched to some cheaper, thinner towels from a big box store that dried faster but felt as cheap as they the price we paid. While these don't remind me of that luxurious spa feeling I was hoping to capture, they are very nice. I machine washed and dried them twice, but they still seem to shed TINY little fuzzes. I see them on my husband's eyelashes after he gets out of the shower and always worry they'll get in his eyes. However, they are not as bad as some towels (like the notorious dark towels that leave you looking like Big Foot..). Maybe after a few more washes they'll soften up, if so I'll update this review.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 13, 2015
Author: Kenny D.
Title: Good towels
Body: I really like these towels. I do not like overly soft floppy towels. They always seem to move water around opposed to removing water. These are soft but not too soft. They actually dry me off but are not rough on the skin. They are not thin but are so so fluffy they take up a lot of space and take forever to dry. I would order more. I have only washed maybe 4-5 times and they are holding up well. I have not had the issues that others have had. They are not leaving fuzz on my body or bathroom. They are not falling apart at the edges or anywhere else.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2016
Author: Jacob Abba
Title: It's a spa experience
Body: I was disappointed when I opened the box. To feel them right from the manufacturer you'd think they were no better than common bath towels. However, I washed them and added fabric softener. They plump up like spa towels - and at $9/piece - well worth the money. They are fluffy and full. If you have towel warmer or take them straight out of the dryer after a shower - it is a spa experience.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 30, 2017
Author: Mickeyb
Title: Perfect! Thick
Body: Perfect! Thick, soft and absorbent ... and have made it through multiple wash cycles with no sign of wear. I'd say about the best towels I ever owned... no, no abouts about it - the best towels I ever owned. I'll buy again if these ever wear out.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 16, 2017
Author: Dana Hotka
Title: Garbage. Do not purchase
Body: Terrible quality. Just got them a week ago and all of them after one wash are unraveling. Still shedding profusely after a couple washes. Absolute garbage!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 22, 2018
Author: melinda mckissick
Title: Poor quality material!!
Body: Bought these a month ago and they already have large holes in them.  I know it's the product because it's not happening with my other towels. Poor quality material! Will not buy again!!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 14, 2015
Author: Chatanqua
Title: Solid Plush Feel, Even After A Dozen Dryer Cycles
Body: No complaints here. Price was righteous and launders well even months later. Looks luxurious and beats towels you'd pick up from a retailer like Walmart. Maybe I'm setting my expectations low, but seriously, why buy junk like that when you can wait a day and get something fsntaftic like this for the same price or less?

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2015
Author: Funfun11
Title: not worth the money
Body: Save some money I have gotten softer cheaper towels at target.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2016
Author: BLAKE10812
Title: Walmart towles are better...
Body: Non absorbent...soft to the point of being slick to the touch...practicably water repellent...nothing "Luxury" about this product...big disappointment...

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 8, 2014
Author: Victor Larson
Title: Don't Waste your money, Item is not luxury towels.
Body: I just ordered towels but after several washes, it is fraying. I guess it is good quality but I do not thick so. Color is not exactly white.

Date: Reviewed in Mexico on October 8, 2020
Author: Pachila
Title: PERFECTAS
Body: Son bonitas, de muy buen tamaño. Gran absorción, no sueltan pelusas y no se deshilachan.Compra 100% recomendable.

Date: Reviewed in Canada on January 16, 2021
Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Great
Body: Great towels. After first wash they were so fluffy. Will purchase more

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 16, 2020
Author: Greggory Basore
Title: Towels do not induce invisibility as expected, but function otherwise perfectly.
Body: Like most people, I expect a bath towel, when properly wrapped around my torso and invoked with the key word(s) to warp light around me in such a way that I can't be seen by the ordinary human eye.These towels do not do that.I'm still giving them five stars, though, because they function so perfectly in every other way. Big, soft, warm and fluffy, they allow me to dry off after showering with enough comfort that I can temporarily recall the sensation of wrestling with a stoned polar bear during my early days of training to be a super hero. Even though that career path didn't pan out (mostly due to misfiled paperwork) it's always nice to recall the days when I was getting in shape with the goal of saving the world.Highly recommended for anyone who's feeling adventurous.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 18, 2019
Author: Jaelene Morris
Title: They're not a towel I've had in luxury hotels.
Body: I must reconsider my rating for the first order. The towels are very large, they are soft, but they are not plush as are the ones I was furnished while staying at luxury hotels such as the Hyatt Regency, the MGM Grand, Harvey's Casino and Resort, Chuckchansi Casino and Resort Hotel. They are significantly thinner than those which were located in the hotels I mentioned; I have stayed in many more luxury hotels that are too many to mention. I will add the Fairmont Hotel, the Mark IV and the Hyatt Regency all in San Francisco, California. These towels are good but they don't hold a candle to a luxury hotel quality. I wish they were like the ones in the luxury hotels, but I did get what I paid for, not what was advertised.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 7, 2020
Author: victoria s.yunker
Title: I washed mine hot with Vinegar first
Body: Those are wonderful Towels if you first wash them separate with Vinegar once first I used kinda the hot cycle on washer. They will shed first tumble then they are just wonderful soft and absorb water well. Second and 3rd wash they get softer each time and no more shedding of fiber.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 11, 2020
Author: Brad M.
Title: Soft and Absorbent; High lint and manufacturing quality questionable
Body: Soft and absorbent as advertised, but after 5 full machine wash cycles these towels still put off an incredible amount of lint. There is already threading coming loose on the edges which causes me to question the manufacturing quality.  I purchased similar style/priced towels from Costco at the same time which have no lint or quality issues. Not the best investment for someone looking for quality.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 15, 2020
Author: Paul White
Title: Not an absorbent towel
Body: I was a bit taken back because of the overwhelmingly positive reviews for this product. But, I fear that many people are victims of the carefully crafted search terms for this product. Words like luxury, hotel, premium and turkish are descriptions for a much better product than this one.First off, when laundered, the lint tray is completely full. Seems like that shouldn't happen.The biggest issue that I have with the towel is that its water absorbency is severely reduced. You don't get dried off. Isn't drying off the point of a towel?Ten bucks for a towel that doesn't dry you off is just not a good investment. My recommendation is to avoid this one and try something that does the job it's designed for.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 30, 2021
Author: PB
Title: Towels, after washing, are great!  Came in large box with lots of padding.
Body: The towels after washing, are soft, and absorbent and quite nice.Also, they came in large box with lots of padding. I'm very glad they didnt get damaged in shipping..... It would have been a shame if they cracked or shattered....

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2019
Author: Bryan1117
Title: 3 Month Review
Body: These towels are very soft when you first get them. After several washing they're not quite as soft but they are still pretty good. The towels are thin. So if you're looking for a plush towel this is not for you. They do absorb water well. I haven't had any issues in terms of the towel falling apart or any issues from washing. Overall these are okay towels. They not luxury but for the price they offer a good value.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 1, 2018
Author: Patrick O
Title: Great Absorancy and Softness for the Value
Body: I was very satisfied with the towels contrary to some of the reviews posted on the site.  I have spent $40 per bath sheet before and bought high quality towels which lasted 8 years -- suffice to say they were not as fluffy at the end of that period.  However -- after two months of washing and drying these towels they have held up remarkably well and continue to come out of the dryer with good heft and thickness and they have not seemed to lose any absorbancy as noted by some other.  I ended up buying 3 packs of them for a total of 12 towels and for the money spent -- I couldn't be happier.  Note: to those who are complaining about absorbancy issues -- DO NOT dry your towels with fabric softener sheets -- it impacts the towels ability to suck up moisture.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 28, 2020
Author: Nick
Title: Towels are very thin and do not absorb water great
Body: Very disappointed in these towels. They were very thin, 2 towels folded were as thick as a normal thick towel I purchased from JC Penny. At this price I would not recommend.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 18, 2020
Author: Rhys De Blasio
Title: If you do your research and know what you are buying these deliver in every way
Body: Make sure to research the whole Egyptian Vs Turkish towels stuff so you know what you prefer and are getting.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 14, 2020
Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Happy
Body: I brought these as a gift for a friend but I like them so much that I am ordering a set for me

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2015
Author: prisrob
Title: Soft and Fluffy
Body: There comes a time when the old towels must be recycled. That time is now, for me. I have very nice towels from Macys, and some Martha Stewart towels. They wore well, did not shrink nor ravel. However, they just aren't the same. I like fluffy white bath towels. In the Spring I purchased new washcloths and hand towels, so I now have a matching set of everything.I perused the towel reviews on Amazon and other shopping sites, and these Luxury Hotel &Spa Towels looked like the best quality. I will do whatever it takes to avoid the mall, unless my granddaughter asks me to take her. But, then, we look at things that interest her, certainly not towels. I am very pleased with these towels. They are big 27x 54 inches, fluffy and feel good. I washed and dried them, and they look the same. A little lint in the dryer but not much. They felt very soft after my shower, and absorb water very well. They are a lovely bright white, and just what I wanted, much better than expected. My daughter is looking for new towels, and I will show her these. At $10 a piece, these towels are perfect.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 11, 2020
Author: Veronica
Title: Don’t even dare
Body: These towels are a nightmare! Don’t even think of it! Let’s start by saying it has poor absorbency, it glides through without drying your body leaving fabric material on you. Second of all, the lint is ernomous! Thirdly, they are not thick and not cotton. Who knows what the hell they are made of. I gave up on them and gave them to goodwill.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2017
Author: KevInFl
Title: Don't Use Dryer Sheets!
Body: I've had these two months now. I like them. First, when I received them I immediately washed them with a little soap and vinegar a couple of times. Second I put them in the dryer WITHOUT any dryer sheets. Plenty of lint in the lint tray but the towels did not shed anywhere near as much as many new towels do (no matter what you pay for them). I've learned never to put dryer sheets when I dry these towels. By not doing this the towels stay much more absorbent. Good product that I will buy again.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2018
Author: BSchauerte
Title: On the heavy side -- but not a good value
Body: They look average, but Turkish Terry is now about as good as "American Cheese"There is an accent design on both ends, so you don't need to worry about which side is showing when hung on a barDownside = they take 4-6 swipes to absorb as well as lower priced towels.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 24, 2019
Author: Sean
Title: What a let down.
Body: I'm not sure where all the rave reviews come from. I've been looking forward to buying soft towels for quite some time. When I opened the package only to realize the towels are rougher than some of my dish towels I was super bummed out. Nothing but a let down. I'm seeing pictures that others received and they don't even look the same. Not sure what's going on.The chapstick is for size reference.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 16, 2015
Author: roberta mcleod
Title: Four Stars
Body: great price ,fluffy ,absorbent ,quality good ,most of all my wife loves them .The price was better than Target and Kohls as some paid reviews said ,checked online and local stores across from our house no such similar items and the only ones close where 30-40% higher on sale.We are Amazon customers and buy almost 100 items in last six months .Be cautious of fake five stars and really bad reviews ,they are mostly paid for by other companies .We have had to send back items at Amazons expense because of this and Amazon has always taken care of this for us no questions asked .Thank you Amazon

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 4, 2015
Author: kreilly
Title: reasonably thick and soft
Body: The towels are fairly plush. The weave doesn't seem as tight as other towels I have (PB and Restoration) and there have been a couple of pulls. I will be curious to see how long the plushness lasts. But for the price it is a quarter of the cost. So, I think it's worth every penny especially if these are high frequency use whites that will be stains or used by teenaged or rental home guests. I'll report back in several months to see how they stand up to repetitive washings.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 12, 2015
Author: cybernurse
Title: I'm pleased with this purchase
Body: I'm pleased with this purchase. It's near impossible to buy towels online w/o seeing or touching them first. You just don't know what you're going to wind up with. So I took a chance (which I do all the time) and these towels seemed to hold up well in the wash (I washed them 3 times before putting them to use, just to make sure I didn't need to return them, in case they fell apart in the wash or dryer). So far, so good. They've been through the wash and dry probably 5 times already and they're holding up nicely. (I've decided to stay with white for most all of my towels, as my colored towels wound up coming out of the dryer with what looks like bleach stains on them, even when I'm not using anything but plain old laundry detergent.) I often have overnight guests using my colored towels, and it's these that wind up looking weird and stained after laundering. I recently read that face creams containing benzol peroxide can cause this to happen, or other agents that are used on the skin. This most likely explains why some of my colored towels began to get white "bleach-like" stains on them. For this reason, white towels are my "go to" whenever I have guests overnight. Hope this helps someone else avoid what's going on with my colored towels. (Please write a comment if you've experienced the same phenomenon. OK?)

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 15, 2017
Author: EKS
Title: leaves little pieces of fabric on your skin
Body: I don't understand people who liked this product.  They leave little pieces of fabric on your skin after you use them which is the worst a towel can do in my mind.  Had to return, yuk!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 19, 2015
Author: CBB
Title: NOT Turkish Cotton
Body: I have no clue what all the hype is over these towels? 1. There is no possible way these are truly Turkish Cotton as advertised. There is a noticeable difference from standard cotton and Turkish cotton. 2. These reminded me of cheap hotel room towels, thin and not an overly thick, soft touch, as you would expect.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 4, 2018
Author: Bobby Reardon
Title: not good..
Body: Washed, then put in dryer...towels started to disintegrate...not good...stay clear of these towels.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 16, 2017
Author: Anthony
Title: Not so luxurious...
Body: The description "Luxury Hotel & Spa..." Is flagrantly misleading. These could only be considered "Luxury" if you think that the Motel 6 is a five star resort.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2018
Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Doesn't actually dry
Body: It's a nice looking towel, but if you want one that dries, this is not the one for you. My daughter won't use this towel because it doesn't actually absorb.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 4, 2015
Author: KimcheeMomma
Title: Better than hotel towels
Body: Nice thick towels that are bright white. Very absorbent and soft. I have had them for a few months and I'm a serial washer so they have been washed more than average. They still look and feel new.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2015
Author: phbills
Title: The Good: Good size and extremely absorbent The Bad
Body: The Good: Good size and extremely absorbentThe Bad: The stitching/hemming on the end of one of the four came loose after one wash, and another after about 6 washes.  About 12 washes total on all 4 and no further deterioration other than can be expected from normal wear and use.The Upside: The dry cleaner 4 doors down from where I work sewed up the loose stitching for free.Also note that you WILL need to clean out the lint trap of your dryer 2-3 times during the first 2 or 3 wash and dry cycles, and I would RECOMMEND 1-2 times during subsequent wash and dry cycles.  Speeds the drying process in my opinion, and helps prevent fire so I've been told.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 17, 2018
Author: KW
Title: Sheds too much lint
Body: The continue to shed an exhorbitant amount of lint ater multiple washes. Ever time I dry off out of the shower I am covered with lint

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 10, 2014
Author: connie
Title: nice quality
Body: soft and absorbent and less then 10..00 each and they come out of the wash nicely.I recommend this product. Exactly what it says it is......

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 19, 2018
Author: Leonardo Manrique
Title: too expensive
Body: for the quality and size, those towels are to expensive.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2014
Author: Lorraine
Title: normally I like to touch and feel towels prior to purchasing them
Body: I was hesitant to order towels online, normally I like to touch and feel towels prior to purchasing them. I took a chance and have been very happy with quality. I have washed and dried them over the last two months and they just keep getting better. They were soft and thick when new and they still are.I would recommend buying them if you are in the market for towels. I plan on purchasing more of these in the future.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 10, 2014
Author: CT Customer
Title: Just right
Body: Not too thick, not too thin, these towels are just about right for daily use. They're definitely soft, fluffy and absorbent, and a good value for the money. I am sightly disappointed in the quality, as I've already discovered at least one long pull and I've had to cut a few strings. The size is fine, but based on other reviews, I expected them to be slightly larger. For the money, would buy again.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 11, 2014
Author: Kevin D. Myers
Title: Towels are excellent
Body: I was afraid to order due to the low star issues with fraying, and lint.NONE of this happened. They come with washing instructions. I even tried one before washing just to see. I found only a few loose lint pieces right out of the bag. None after being washed. I waited for 2 washings to rate them and these are the best towels I have now. I recommend them.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 1, 2014
Author: B.A.
Title: As advertised
Body: They are as soft and fluffy and absorbent as it says. I would highly recommend a couple of sets. Thanks.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 16, 2016
Author: valli
Title: also good for guest
Body: exactly what I wanted...........also good for guest, said it made them feel pampered.  I like the fact that they were a good value.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 20, 2014
Author: Marianne R
Title: Perfect weight
Body: Great towels -perfect weight towels.  Thirsty but not so thick that they are still damp the next day. All Cotton just feels great. Great customer service.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2016
Author: Amazon Customer
Title: ... another seller -- fulfilled by Amazon and they were great. I thought I was purchasing the same thing
Body: I had bought a set of towels with the exact same description from another seller -- fulfilled by Amazon and they were great.  I thought I was purchasing the same thing.These towels are made in China, came about a month after I ordered them and are as thin as bad motel towels.Blech!  Either there was some type of mix-up, or I just got scammed.  Was too busy moving to write a review sooner, but had to put it down in writing while I had a chance.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 21, 2014
Author: Peewee
Title: Beyond our expectations
Body: So very pleased with our purchase.  Arrived quickly, well packaged, priced so well for such quality bath towels.  After washing them and using for the first time found that they were huge in size, soft and very absorbent.Will be purchasing another set of four in the next few days. Don't miss these if you are looking for a good set of towels.  Excellent.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 23, 2015
Author: VickyO
Title: They look like something you get at K-mart or Walmart
Body: I bought the most expensive, however, when delivery, the excitement quickly faded when I opened the package and saw the quality.  Not sure why they rate this item as luxury hotel & spa towels.  They look like something you get at K-mart or Walmart.  Horrible quality, they are thin and rough to the touch.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2016
Author: joelle morgan
Title: Order returned
Body: I received towels that were snagged and had to return my order.  They were really nice to the touch and it was probably just a fluke that they were snagged.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2015
Author: Alpha Pirate
Title: Towels were made in Pakistan not Genuine Turkish Cotton as ...
Body: Towels were made in Pakistan not Genuine Turkish Cotton as advertised. Folks this is blatant mis-advertising. Pakistani cotton and quality is vastly inferior to Turkish

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2017
Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Sure they are nice and fluffy but the aggrivation of lint on all ...
Body: Warning!!!!!  If you purchase these towels you may want to have a washer/dryer exclusively to launder these towels.  They will shed on everything you wash for loads and loads and loads.  Sure they are nice and fluffy but the aggrivation of lint on all of your clothes is enough to drive one insane.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2015

Title: Terrible Towels
Body: Horrible.  The size of the towel is good for a toddler!  Don't buy

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 14, 2016
Author: joanne
Title: Four Stars
Body: Like them very much but not as luxurious as I expected.  Price good.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 11, 2014

Title: We love soft white towels
Body: Pretty happy with these towels, compare to the ones I got from Marshall, these are better quality and doesn't feel as rough...

Author: Abtd
Title: One Star
Body: Cheap towels. I won't be using them.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 2, 2015

Title: Great Towels... Until You Wash Them
Body: These towels, which are awesome for a first use, don't go through the laundry well. Even on the machine's gentlest cycle, they frayed after the first wash. I can only image what will happen to them after consecutive washes.

Title: One Star

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 26, 2015
