Title: Fell apart after 1 use.
Body: These towels fell apart after 1 -  yes 1 - use.  See pics.  Do not recommend.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 14, 2014
Author: biola Adekanbi
Title: One Star
Body: These towels were not absorbent at all.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2015
Author: Todd J. Behrens
Title: waste of money
Body: There is nothing special about these towels. Vaguely softer than bargain basement towels at a discount store. But after an initial washing before putting them to use, there were loose threads and areas of unraveling stitching. $10 a piece for towels worth $4 each. Incredibly disappointed in the towels and the many positive reviews that led to this purchase.

Date: Reviewed in Canada on July 5, 2020
Author: J Blake
Title: Love the towels!!! please make me a house coat??
Body: These towels are soft and comfy made with quality cotton. I will be buying more of these. Once you try one them you won’t go back to others. Thick plush and over the top comfy, I wish they made house coats

Date: Reviewed in Canada on October 16, 2020
Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Great towels
Body: Absorbent and soft.  They are holding up well after weekly washing.  Would buy again.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 16, 2020
Author: TG
Title: you get what you pay for, they do the job
Body: The towels arrived on time and were well packaged. I have washed them three times now, with my normal detergent and softener, and can say that they are very basic. Not rough but not soft, and they are not fluffy. They are bright white and do the job. But I've purchased softer, more absorbent Fieldcrest towels at Target for the same price.  Those are two years old and nicer than these.  If you want fluffy, luxurious towels, pay the extra money and buy them in a store where you can feel them for yourself. I am not disappointed in the purchase, they were a bargain. But I won't purchase towels like these again.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2021
Author: Heather Franke
Title: Poor quality
Body: These towels are just over six months old, and it is only my husband and myself in the household, so it’s not like they’re getting overused or being abused by small kids. This is how I pulled this tile out of the washer yesterday.The towels are thick, and very soft, but they are not very absorbent, as they just push the water around your skin, and then to find all of the strings coming out of it like this at less than six months old is a real disappointment. Guess I’ll be looking for new towels again.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 11, 2021
Author: Amazon Customer
Title: DO NOT BUY - UNENDING LINT STORM
Body: DO NOT BUY - 100% WASTE OF MONEY. These towels are so full of lint - even after four trips through the wash - that you literally cannot physically dry yourself. You will still be wet, just also covered in lint.The amount of lint that came out of the dryer is borderline demonic, and it never stops. I can only assume that the materials are absolute garbage quality because I have never experienced this issue before with other towels or fabric in general.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 3, 2020
Author: yvonne chipman
Title: worth the money
Body: i was pleasantly surprise after receiving these towels, the review has me scared, but i ordered them, soaked them for 12 hours before washing, when i got them out of the washer there were alot of lent left in the washer, as well as the first time i dried them,, but they plushed right up, and are very soft and heavy. i would and did order another 4 pk.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 13, 2021
Author: Court Jester
Title: All the towels started Shredding about 8 months in, just threw out the last one
Body: Used for drying after showers. Alternated with other towels for color variety. After a while, while drying our backs, we heard a cracking/shredding noise and after a couple days you see holes in the towel in different areas. and we are not talking about using strength here, its just rubbing the towel on your back using a side to side motion. Can't say as I have ever had this issue with towels in my 46 years.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 28, 2016
Author: D. Perez
Title: So far, I love them
Body: I recently decided to replace a set of towels I bought 10 years ago and wanted something of similar quality, since the brand I had previously bought had increased drastically in price. I researched best towels of 2016, and almost every review I found (Best 10, Best 5, Best 3) listed these. I was pleased when they arrived, and doubly pleased the first time I used them. They are fluffy and very absorbent. They created a good bit of lint the first time I washed them, but I shook them really hard before putting them in the dryer and vacuumed up everything that fell off. The dryer filter was full at the end of the cycle, but no lint came off on my skin or hair the first time I used them. I like the fact that the hems are double-stitched, which I think will help prevent raveling. I read a tip in another review that I tried, which might be helpful. I washed the towels the first time with 2 cups of white vinegar, which the other reviewer says removes any coating that might have been applied at the factory to repel insects or stains. Then I gave them a second wash with my regular detergent. I bought white towels, but I won't be bleaching them, as bleach weakens fabric. So far, I give these towels five stars. Only time will tell how they hold up.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 25, 2021
Author: Toni
Title: Thin towels!!!!!  Very, very thin!!!!!
Body: I purchased the towels for my granddaughter-They were quite thin!!  I assumed that after she laundered them they would thicken up in the dryer-NO, they did not!!  Why they had been compared to "luxury hotel, and spa towels" is beyond me!!  If you are looking for towels that mimic 'luxury hotel, and spa towels look elsewhere!!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 3, 2019
Author: Jarrett Brown
Title: Updated rating
Body: Recieved item and washed them alone as instructed. I have front load washer and dryer so no agitators. The towels came unraveled except for one. They are soft but not happy that i spent 40 bucks for 4 towels and 3 are messed up. I cut the unraveled parts off hoping to salvage the towels. As of now id highly advise not to purchase.Update: they have held together quiye nicely i have updated my rating.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 25, 2016
Author: Julia L. Los Angeles
Title: Perfect White Towels that Hold Up GREAT!
Body: These towels are thick, soft and wash extremely well!  I first saw these towels when I visited my Sister-In-Law.  After using hers, I came home and immediately searched for them and found these on Amazon.  I also found the "exact" same brand/style on Ebay, for a little less $$.  I ordered one set from Amazon, and one set from Ebay so that I could compare.  Out of the box they were almost identical - but after washing even one time - the towels from Amazon remained super soft and thick, while the ones from Ebay were a little matted and not as soft.  I've had them over over a month, and I have washed them many times, and I will be buying more this afternoon! Everyone in my family loves them.  They are a standard bath size, and hold up well after soaking in a bit of bleach and then using vinegar as a fabric softener.  We have hard water in our City, so oftentimes whites become very dingy - these have held their whiteness and freshness well!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 27, 2019
Author: Jaime Becerra
Title: Best Towels I've Ever Owned
Body: I bought these towels almost a year and a half ago.  We use them everyday and they still look and feel like the first day I bought them.  These are the best towels that I've ever owned.  The fibers don't ball up and the seams have held up just great.  I ordered white because I like to bleach my towels and they come out bright and clean.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 10, 2020
Author: Shopstoomuch19
Title: Product photo coloring is wrong
Body: Not accurate photo of towel. Purchase the green- the product photo is a lot nicer and brighter and vibrant. The actual towel is boring and ugly.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 23, 2015
Author: Jamie
Title: Soft and absorbent, but not quite wide enough
Body: I really like these so far. They're super soft, but not the kind of soft that doesn't absorb well. Very thick and plush. My only complaint is the size. The length is great, but the width seems just a couple inches too short compared to a "normal" towel. They barely cover my behind, and I'm not tall at all. I can't imagine a woman with a long torso or a lot of body fat being able to use them without flashing everyone in the house on the way back to her bedroom! So just keep that in mind: if you're tall or you have a lot to cover up, and you live with people you *don't* want to flash...these probably won't work. Buy some towels that are a few inches wider. But otherwise, these are lovely. Very plush and luxurious.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 22, 2017
Author: Sam G
Title: Great Towels!
Body: These towels are great.  They are soft, very absorbent, and just the right size.  Plenty big to cover all your parts, but not so big that they swallow you up.  I would recommend washing them once before use.  When you first take them out of the package and dry yourself with them, they don't absorb water as well.  Something about being brand new I guess.  But wash and dry them once, and absorb water well.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 14, 2021
Author: epq
Title: Color was almost neon; not like photo.
Body: The color was NOT like the photo. We called it “safety cone orange”. Kinda neon. It was promptly returned.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 21, 2020
Author: Penny Swearengin
Title: Beautiful towels
Body: More than I expected they are beautiful

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 11, 2020
Author: Colorado customer
Title: Disintegrating Material
Body: I bought these towels in January and by October of the same year, they had disintegrated themselves. We have a good amount of towels, and there are only two of us, so we weren’t using them even on a weekly basis. Also, we don’t have a center agitator in our washing machine, so our washing machine is not the issue. Two of the four towels disintegrated and are totally unusable. Don’t but these— unless you want to replace them within the year.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 20, 2019
Author: whim reader
Title: Timeless, satisfying, thick and fluffy, exactly what I was looking for
Body: Thick and heavy, but absorbs and dries quickly, hangs beautifully, bright and fluffy - perfect for daily use and regular hot wash and dryer. These are keepers, and worth the money for long-term practical use, lovely feel and beauty.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2021
Author: CatLady
Title: Wash 1st or suffer severe allergic reaction.
Body: Severe Allergic Reaction to new towels!!Have not used yet. Warm Wash them AT LEAST 2-3 times, BEFORE ever using on your skin!!! They burnt my hands red & gave a spotty rash up to my elbows; just from touching them.. Tag: WARM Wash.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 25, 2020
Author: Cool Guy
Title: Don't buy. Bait and switch fraud
Body: The first time I ordered these, they were great. Ordered again and they substituted an inferior product that was lighter weight and less thick.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2020
Author: Sunshine Seeker
Title: These will LINT ALL OVER THE PLACE -  beware
Body: The size is fine but the huge mess it made in our laundry is sad.  Just know that first washing might want to be done at a public laundry mat.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 26, 2020
Author: Shannon
Title: Terrible quality!!
Body: I've had these towels for 1 month and they are already coming apart. Also the amount of lint the towels produce is staggering. The fuzz that ends up on my face and body is annoying. I will not recommend! Poor quality!!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 15, 2019
Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Excellent!
Body: These towels are very thick and they do offer what you pay for. The only thing is that I would recommend washing them a couple of times before use as they still shed cotton (but that’s not bad at all).

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2020
Author: Jonesey
Title: very thin under impressed
Body: What a difference 200 GSM makes. I have 900 GSM towels today. Thought I'd try these, at 700 GSM.I kept them. Will use for my dog.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2020
Author: Spencer Maloney
Title: More like basic hotel
Body: I'd not refer to them as luxury more like basic hotel, I use them in my guest room for which I have none besides family a few times a year, they are good for that. 😂 I bet I end up donating them to someone.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 4, 2016
Author: Leslie
Title: Super soft and plush!
Body: These are super plush and wonderful towels! I was really skeptical about ordering towels online without being able to see or feel how thick they are. These are worth the gamble. They are super soft and cozy. It feels like my bathroom has been transformed into a spa. They do leave quite a bit of lint in the dryer lint trap after the first wash, but that problem is easily solved by cleaning the lint trap.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 28, 2017
Author: dan ignash
Title: Awesome towels
Body: These are the best towels I've ever had period like people say I wash them once and they got over twice the size in fluffiness. You got some fuzzies but you can tell one more wash and dry and you won't have to worry about that anymore. Unlike some towels leave them stuck to my head every time because I'm a Baldy LOL

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 7, 2016
Author: Kat
Title: Good product for the price.
Body: Our guest towels have become run down and it was time for a change.  Normally this would have meant a trip to one of my local stores and just grabbing a set. This time I decided to try something different.  I ordered these towels after searching through quite a few options on Amazon due to the price. I have had them for about a week, and I will say they are better than I expected for the price I paid for towel.  The picture makes them look really fluffy, but as other reviewers noted, they are not overly fluffy.  However, they are soft, which I rather like from my towels.  They have each gone through 3 washes now and are holding up well so far, but I cannot say if that will continue or not.  I will say that for the price they are a good product.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 15, 2020
Author: P.R. Louis
Title: How about a refund?
Body: Towels are poor quality and immediately degraded upon my washing them after opening the package. The pilling nearly filled my lint trap. Maybe a faulty batch of product????

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 17, 2015
Author: Ada L. King
Title: Good deal.
Body: Great price for the quality.  You need to wash them in WARM not hot, and tumble dry SEVERAL times with no other laundry to get rid of the lint. Do NOT use fabric softener in the wash or dry as it coats the fibers and inhibits absorption.I try to wash them separately all the time especially when new.  But that's normal for the fabric of new towels.  Just follow the manufacturer's instructions and you'll have wonderful towels.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 8, 2016
Author: Mleedpitt
Title: Okay, but not the same as the ones previously received..
Body: Bought these two years ago for our home and loved them, they were super plush, thick, and absorbent so I decided to buy the exact same ones again so we could have more on hand. Definitely not the same towels I received the first time. They are not plush at all, and not nearly as thick, but are good for the price so we will keep them. They are still absorbent, just beware that they are the typical spa towels you would think you would receive.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 31, 2014
Author: w109
Title: don't understand all the 5 star reviews
Body: these were a gift and i was told they were a good replacement.  so originally gave 4 stars.12/21/14:  was informed the hem is unravelling and towels are coming apart.  don't understand all the 5 star reviews...it's like they are talking about a totally different product than the one i purchased.  the towels have been consigned to washing and wiping down the car.  i would not recommend this product to anyone.  a waste of money.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 8, 2016
Author: Sarah
Title: Had them now for over a year and they've become the sturdy, non-soft towel that you've come to expect
Body: Between 3 and 4 stars honestly.  They arrived fluffy and satisfying. Had them now for over a year and they've become the sturdy, non-soft towel that you've come to expect.  I'll try something else next because I do want the soft again and some people claim there are good towels out there that can stay soft, but at $10 a piece it's definitely not bad.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 7, 2016
Author: Me reads
Title: Best I have ever found
Body: I own a vacation rental property, and having been searching forever for towels like these.  I don't know how many different name brands I tried before a friend of mine who also has a rental property, recommended these towels.  She told me that they get softer with each wash, and they were the best towels she's ever used.  Admittedly, I was skeptical.  Who ever heard of towels that get softer with each wash?  But she showed me hers, after a year of use, and I thought she was showing me a brand new towel.  They still looked amazing after several repeated washes.  So I took the plunge.Let me say this- these towels are a fantastic value considering the very high quality.  They come with instructions for care, follow them and you will be tickled with these towels. Don't use chlorine bleach, wash in cold water with half the amount of recommended detergent, and a half of cup of vinegar.  Wash the towels alone, don't add other dirty items in with them. They recommend three washes before use.  Dry on low heat. If you find one, cut the occasional loose thread before it unravels to keep your towels looking great. Since I haven't washed mine as much as my friend did, they aren't as soft yet, but she was right...the more you wash, the softer and fluffier they get.  They don't pill, and the amount of lint they produce in the dryer is minimal. My wash load usually consists of 12 bath towels, 6 hand towels and 6 washcloths. After drying, when the lint is collected off the screen, it balls up to the size of a golf ball. Pretty impressive!! I'm also finding that the amount of lint is reduced each time I dry them after washing.Once my budget allows it, I'm replacing my towels here at home with these as well. Would give these more than 5 stars if I could!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 21, 2020
Author: AWall
Title: Good towels but an inaccurate description
Body: These towels aren't too bad.  They are soft and absorbent.  But they aren't thick and luxurious like you'd expect "luxury hotel & spa" towels would be.  When you first receive them, they will look fairly thin.  But when you wash them, they do fluff up a bit and get softer.  I'm keeping them for our house guests - they are nice enough.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 20, 2016
Author: Juan Pelotas
Title: Love them
Body: Super thick. Luxurious. Really like them. Six months later, they are still thick.BUT Beware!!! Clean the dryer filter ASAP after washing these; it will collect a ton of lint from these towels. And clothes dryers are the number one cause of home fires in the US!!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 10, 2016
Author: Lawrence from OIB NC
Title: Good value
Body: We have been using these towels since mid-March 2016.  After several washings, they continue to hold their seams and show no loose threads.  I see from other reviewers that many have found these to be inferior quality.  We have not.  For the money, the towels we got are nice, soft, absorbent, and sturdy.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 13, 2015
Author: Ebeneezer Goode
Title: Great towels!
Body: These are a significant step up from my old department store towels.  So great, I wound up ordering the matching hand towels and face cloths.  All are of the same high quality.  These towels are extremely soft and fluffy.  They do need to be washed and dried before use, but hold up.  I've washed them multiple times over the last few weeks and am not noticing excessive lint now.  Still so soft and fluffy you can fold one up into an extremely cushy poolside pillow.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 24, 2017
Author: Bob B
Title: Good buy
Body: For the price they are very good towels. They aren't Sorbel but they cost about a quarter of the price and are still soft and absorbant. I would buy them again.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2016
Author: Jennifer Mulhall
Title: The perfect bath towel!
Body: The      are one of my greatest online towel purchases. I am very cautious about buying towels online because I like to be able to touch them to feel how soft and plush they are before purchasing. Usually if they are too thick they don't end up soaking up the water as I like. However, these are a perfect blend of thickness, softness, and plushness. Will definitely be buying more.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 29, 2018
Author: Tanner Scadden
Title: No time to return from when I actually recieved tbem
Body: Very cheap towels and beware of the return policy. I tried to request a refund the same day i actually recieved

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 5, 2016
Author: Nicole
Title: Back to Purchase Again
Body: Shocked by how much I love these!Super soft and thick. They're not as long as I thought they were going to be but the plushness makes up for it!I purchased the white ones and I wash them in bleach - They've probably been thru 100 cycles and still as soft as I got them. I would absolutely purchase these again and I probably will now that I'm on the page!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 3, 2018
Author: Steven Chang
Title: Super linty towels - save your money
Body: This is hands down the worst towels I've gotten. Get these if you totally drying your clean fresh body only to find white lint stuck all over your body and face.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 1, 2014
Author: Bill from 336
Title: Lovin' the towels
Body: We've order these towels twice.  So far, they've all been laundered several times and we have no complaints.  They do arrive pretty flat as others have noted, but after the first wash they fluff up nicely.  Be sure that first wash is just the towels or be prepared for the Lint Olympics.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2016
Author: Jesse R.
Title: One towel started fraying the first time I washed it ...
Body: One towel started fraying the first time I washed it, other 3 are OK so far.  Not the plushness I had hoped for, but gets the job done and not overly expensive.  Would give it 4 stars if it wasn't for the one defective one I received.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2014
Author: oh_wow!
Title: Not absorbent
Body: Nice size (bath sheets), wraps completely around an average sized adult.  Plush, nice clean white, washes well.NOT absorbent and I've never seen a towel leave so much lint in the dryer, even after a half dozen washes.  Would not repurchase.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 29, 2016
Author: Happy across the river
Title: These are the towels you have been looking for.
Body: These bug thick fluffy white towels have held up through several launderings without unraveling or becoming threadbare. They look nearly as good as when first purchased. A great buy.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 23, 2016
Author: GP
Title: Need more!
Body: Love these towels, especially for the price. I wash them frequently, even with bleach, and they are holding up quite well. Thinking of purchasing more, grandkids are moving in!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 15, 2019
Author: MCW
Title: These are not luxury towels
Body: These are not luxury towels. They are thin. Not plush and soft. Definitely not the fluffy, thick luxurious towels I thought I would be getting. Promptly returned.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 11, 2016
Author: Linda L. Dias
Title: Great Towels
Body: Love these towels so soft and absorbent.  I feel like I am at a luxury spa or expensive hotel when I use these towels.  They wash beautifully also.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 6, 2014
Author: Trinna Jane
Title: These are really nice. Had lint the first wash
Body: These are really nice.  Had lint the first wash, so I was glad the first wash was done at a laundromat.  After that, they were fluffy with a normal lint level.  Every shower feels like a luxurious indulgence with these.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 31, 2015
Author: Dare
Title: Hotel feel at home.
Body: Bought a set of these towels and the description says it all.  I feel like I am at a spa or hotel when i get out the shower.  I washed when them and as one reviewer stated, there is an excessive amount of lint.  But, I will definitely by 4 more.  I have already begun getting rid of older towels so i can make room for new one.Great purchase.  I would recommend to anyone looking for a quality towel.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 10, 2014
Author: timbo
Title: Judge them after a wash!
Body: When I first received them I was unimpressed. As these were to be a gift i was hesitant to unpack & wash them. I'm so glad I did. Fluffed up really nice. Not a super heavyweight towel but heavier than average. Well worth the price.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2015
Author: Happy Gurl
Title: So glad I got these
Body: I am very picky about my bath towels-- I like them fluffy and thirsty and these do the trick. Really high quality towels that launder up perfectly.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2016
Author: Paul Arensburg
Title: Totally Satisfying Experience!
Body: Excellent value towels very absorbent.  Seller very prompt with reasonable packaging.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2016
Author: D. Hoefner
Title: Great towels. They are holding up well after repeated ...
Body: Great towels. They are holding up well after repeated washing--staying almost as soft and fluffy as when they were new. Recommended.

Author: Kayla
Title: Super soft towels with minimal shrinkage
Body: Super soft towels with minimal shrinkage. What can I say, I will definitely be purchasing my towels from this company in  the future.

Author: Dennis J
Title: Not quite as absorbent as i would like
Body: These are a really good deal and i am hopeful that with a few more washings they will become more absorbent. Have only washed them twice now and they seem to get more absorbent each time.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2018

Title: heavy and nice! We ordered more
Body: We have had these towels for about a month and we're loving them! They are soft, thick, heavy and nice! We ordered more!

Body: The towels were as described. I was very happy with the order. I don't like being told that I need to leave a certain amount of information on any review. What is up with that. Get real.

Body: Fluffy alright, but not absorbent, still leaves a film of water on skin. Not as good as the towels I have already.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 24, 2015
Author: Song writer
Title: OK Towels
Body: When I first received these towels, they seemed attractive,  very soft and sturdy. However, I am finding that they are not that absorbent. It seems to take awhile to dry off and afterwards, I still feet somewhat wet. Since I haven't had them too long, I cannot comment on long term durability. I am hoping that after more washings, they become more absorbent.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 5, 2016
Author: DJM
Title: I needed some good towels to replace my old worn out ones
Body: I needed some good towels to replace my old worn out ones. I got these on a special prime sale and I LOVE them! They are nice and thick and very high quality. They do a great job absorbing water and do not loose their shape after washing. I was so pleased with them, I ordered the hand towel and wash clothes of the same brand!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2014
Author: D.Wang
Title: Good value, but don't expect "luxury"
Body: The towels are good and about similar to something you could get at Target for $15. The size of the towels are a bit narrow. They are about 4 inches narrower than all my other standard size bath towels which was kind of disappointing. Though the dimensions of the towels are listed on the page. Stitching and overall quality seems to be good. 3.5 stars

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 11, 2016
Author: Monica
Title: Definitely not amazing!
Body: I read several reviews, stating these towels were all that and more. And while they do the job in the drying department, they are not super duper fluffy, they are not super absorbent, and they do leave specs of material on you while drying. I am not pleased with the claims and would not repurchase these towels.The only reason I am giving a three star...they are inexpensive towels, they do absorb, and they do have a nice aesthetic appeal.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2015
Author: jsergo
Title: Perfect Turkish Towels
Body: These are beautiful, lush towels made with Turkish cotton.  I purchased them as a gift but they are so beautiful I am going to buy a set for myself.  The quality is exceptional and the price is amazing.  Once you have tried these towels you won't want anything else.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 20, 2016
Author: Deborah Blackburn
Title: Plush and Durable Towels
Body: Awesome, very plush towels! Would highly recommend.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 26, 2014
Author: Yessong
Title: Average, nothing special
Body: Definitely average towels, hardly "luxury."  Not particularly thick or absorbent, and even on the scratchy side. Just an okay value that I won't seek again.  Can only assume those raving in their reviews have never owned truly top-line towels.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 1, 2016
Author: Daniel
Title: Clogging Washing Machine & Dryer, Soiling Other Clothes - Very poor quality, not even worth the cheap price
Body: UPDATE AFTER USING AND WASHING TOWELS 2-3 TIMES:The towels are actually worse than initially thought. After every wash, thousands of white lint pieces rain out of the towels, soiling other washed items and damaging and clogging dry cleaner. I will throw these towels into the trash now.------Very poor quality towels. After the first washing the towels were already severely damaged. Not even worth the, admittedly cheap, price.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2015
Author: EVE CONFESSORE
Title: Wonderful product. Great for the price.
Body: I love the long length of these spa towels. They are not as wide as expected but that could be a distortion between the long length and my old eyes. White, fluffy, luxurious. Great value if you know how to "compare apples to apples".

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 17, 2014
Author: D. M. Farrar
Title: Turkish towels are super!
Body: I believe these to be of excellent quality and perfect bath size. Soft and love that they are Turkish made!  I will order more!  In the past I have ordered from Renovator's Supply, these rate right up with them, and less cost!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 23, 2014
Author: LJN
Title: You get what you pay for.
Body: Con'sThese towels starting fraying at the seams after the first wash.There was a lot of lint for the first couple of washes, but now its better.Pro'sThe towels are cheapThey are soft.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2015
Author: Ian
Title: Not that soft, or absorbent. Reviews are misleading and possibly fake.
Body: I have a feeling that most of the reviews on this product are fake. The towels are just ok, not that thick or soft to the touch, and already have loose threads. I immediately decided to return them once I saw their poor quality.

Title: Great towels
Body: Was looking for soft, large towels to improve our towel collection. These did not disappoint. Very soft, very strong towels. Would recommend these to anyone looking for good towels.

Title: These are super soft and absorbent
Body: Are you wet right now? Buy a towel!!!These are super soft and absorbent...and rather reasonably priced.A bath towel is more efficient than running down the street naked.

Title: We wanted really soft and thick towels, and we've ...
Body: We wanted really soft and thick towels, and we've had these for about 6 months now, we wash them about once a week.  They are still really lofty, soft and absorbent.  I would repurchase when we need to.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2015

Title: First dryer run they were pretty linty, second time they were perfect
Body: Affordable, soft, absorbent. Some other reviewers had complaints about excessive lint. First dryer run they were pretty linty, second time they were perfect. There's really nothing else to say.

Body: Towels are very very thin.  Don't even feel like they absorb water.  Sorry I don't usually complain but this wasn't good.

Title: Definitely would recommend.
Body: Good qualiy, good price and wash up nicely.

Title: Like they other low reviews say these towels are complete ...
Body: I ordered these towels based on review and description. Like they other low reviews say these towels are complete junk. They have the softness of a $3 bathroom mat towel. Returned.

Author: K.S.
Title: Thread Monster
Body: After third or fourth wash one side of these towels breaks out into a mass of individual stray threads. There might be a couple on the other side but one side is a complete mess. I've got some of the cheapest Target towels here and they are of higher quality by far. Extremely disappointed.

Body: Terrible quality! Or the word of "luxury" has been redefined . Bought a pack of four towels, all of them  have an excessive amount of lint all over, and strings coming out all over. Looks like used fluffy blanket. Do not recommend these towel.

Body: Bought these Feb. 2016. Now they are falling apart.

Body: I've washed these towel 3 times and there's fuzz and lint coming from the towels. I have to use a lint remover to get all the fuzz of my face and body. Disappointed.

Title: Great towels for the price!
Body: These towels are nice for the price, but they are not as thick as everybody claims.  Nevertheless, we have them in our guest bath.

Body: Quality below advertised. Also costly and burdensome to return product
