Title: Not quality
Body: I'm not sure why I felt so differently about these towels. These were not soft or quality towels. They are about the same quality as the lowest priced towels available at Target.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2015
Author: buzzbeetribe
Title: One Star
Body: Canceled

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2016
Author: John Wilkins
Title: Just like at luxury hotels
Body: These towels are amazing. They are even better than I expected. I bought the product based on all of the great reviews, and I am happy to say that I am not disappointed. The towels are soft yet durable. They do not cause too much fuzziness when washed and dried. They are truly the quality of the towels that you find in luxury resorts. I have had house-guests comment on them and ask where I got them. They are also a great size, unlike many towels which I find to be a little small. I received this product at a discount in exchange for writing my honest review.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2016
Author: Dave Teu
Title: Infinite lint ...
Body: they look and felt ok when arrived. I listened to other commenters and tried to wash it to get rid of the lint before using.I wash and dried my towers 6 times.. SIX times.. And it's still full of lint.. I have no idea whether i need to change my washing machine or will this be the last time I'm getting this product.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2016
Author: Calvin
Title: Buying from Turkey supports terrorism! Do not support terrorism!
Body: I refuse to buy anything Turkish. Turkey is supporting ISIS, imprisoning journalists who speak out, oppressing the Kurdish population, and violating international law.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 23, 2020
Author: Pamela Campbell
Title: Towel Fairy
Body: I know people who have had towels for 20 years. I have been in their houses and seen the yellow daisy embroidered towels from 1972. I know it is a thing. I can't keep a towel for a year. I have no freaking idea what happens to them and why everyone thinks its ok to throw them out - leave them at a friends. I have beach towels mind you and thats a whole other story. But why are they even at your friends house. I can't.I have been trying to horde these in the master bath - I will be buying more, sooner than later.

Date: Reviewed in Canada on February 24, 2021
Author: aussi
Title: Excellent value
Body: I read all the reviews before I ordered these and was delighted that the quality was as good as most reviews said.  I washed them several times before I used them and they didn't shed at all.Excellent value.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 24, 2020
Author: BizzyEnuf
Title: Luxury? No way! // Plush?? Quite an exageration!
Body: I took a chance on these based on the 5000+ reviews, color choice I wanted, and the many positive comments on the plushness and quality. Well, as soon as I received them, I could tell that washing them WASN'T going to make them much any loftier or plusher or fluffier than what they looked like packed in the plastic protective bag. And I was right. They are just AVERAGE after washing (and I used a full dispenser cup of fabric softener too, just to help them fluff up).Yes - they are soft, but a medium-thinish-weight towel. I have real "plush" 100% cotton towels that are about 7 years old that are still plusher to this day after hundreds of washings than what these towels are brand new. (If I could find that brand again - bought them at Costco - I'd buy more of those.) These new towels are a nice quality as far as the cotton, the terry-loops, and the sewing.But again ... they are NOT THICK, NOR PLUSH. These will probably not last more than a few years and then be flat, thin, rough towels. I am only keeping them as they weren't too expensive and I've no way to assess another brand's claim of true plushness due to having to shop online.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2020
Author: Shelly
Title: R E A L L Y  nice.
Body: I don't think I've ever really visited a "spa", so I can't vouch for that part of the description, but if I had I'm sure I'd be pleased to find big fat fluffy towels like these.  I washed them and threw them in a hot dryer like I do the rest of my stuff since that's going to happen anyway.  So far so good.  I folded them and they're lovely, and fat and fluffy.  I don't even know if I've ever had or used Turkish towels before, but I do like these.  My older towels are supima cotton and made in the U.S., so they weren't inexpensive.  There isn't anything wrong with them, but I realized I now want white in my main bath, and these seemed like a good price if the quality stands up.  My older towels are not worn out, they were really just there for their matching and new appearance (we have our own towels we prefer to use every day(, so they're still substantial, they've just never been so lofty, and I sure wouldn't say they're fluffy like these Turkish towels are.  So is that what the hoopla over Turkish towels is all about?  I don't know, but these are quite nice, and deserve 5 stars.  I bought the matching face towels too.  Seems like they should offer hand towels here as well, but I'm not sure whether or not I'd buy them. Sometimes I find they just get in the way, people dry their hands off on the big ones or the face cloths, and the face cloths came in a pack of twelve, so maybe that'll work.  Anyway, I just ordered four more, and I can definitely recommend them.Update 3/23/2020;  Unlike some reviews I've read, I don't think they're getting softer and fluffier with subsequent washing.  They'll probably never be softer and/or fluffier than they are after the first laundering, but they're still pretty darned soft and fluffy.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 28, 2021
Author: LT
Title: Okay- small towels
Body: Washed in cold water as directed and dried. Did not have significant lint. A few loose strings. Moderate thickness. Effective drying with minimal passes. Soft but not luxurious. Very small. Tall people will not like this. Planned to buy for my dad and bought some for my guest room first to test. Will be finding something else for him. Would not use in a master bath. I usually buy from Costco or target and will continue to use their brands instead. Size is the main concern.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 14, 2021
Author: Iesha
Title: Quality has gone down :(
Body: When I bought this product 3 years ago, I loved it. The quality was amazing, it was thick and plushy, and long lasting. I still use them today. When I ordered them again, in different colors this time, there was an obvious difference in feel, texture and quality. I was expecting the same exact quality as the first bunch I ordered, but the quality has diminished greatly, the new towels feel cheaper and much thinner. It's supposed to fluff up more as you wash it, but there's still no way it can match the quality of the original towels.  3 Stars only for the first set I bought.  I'd rate the new set 1.5 :(

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2021
Author: Michael R. Peterson
Title: Not what I expected at all
Body: I should have known not to buy towels online. I need to touch them and feel them and pick them up. These are hardly "spa" bath towels. They are thin and lightweight, and no doubt will have less than optimal absorbency. I'll stick with my old ones right now and do it the old fashioned way - get in the car and go shop for towels. Never again will I buy them online unless I'm looking to buy towels for the puppies to curl up in or to wash the car.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 28, 2021
Author: N. Shar
Title: Luxurious softness...
Body: This has to be the softest and most absorbent towel that I have ever experienced in my life! How did I go so long without it. You do not need to rub yourself dry. Wrap yourself up and just pat it into the recessed areas.I think about how this small gesture preserves your skin. Now I need full bath sheets and face towels too and a robe.Every morning I feel luxurious!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 26, 2021
Author: Pam Turner
Title: Do. Not. Buy. These.
Body: These towels are without a doubt the worst thing I’ve ever purchased on Amazon. They’re AWFUL. I have washed and dried them over and over all week. Maybe six times in the dryer. This is the accumulated lint….so far. It’s like a whole other towel!  They’ve messed up my washer with wet lint. They’ve made my dryer a dust bowl. I’m going to have to wash and dry a load of my old towels just so I can run a lint-free load of clothes!  I’m hoping I can I return these for a refund. So I can buy some towels that don’t disintegrate in my appliances. Ugh.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 20, 2020
Author: A Mat
Title: Soft and Plush
Body: I bought 12 of these towels almost a month ago.  They came as expected.  I washed them before using them.  They are definitely thicker than our old ones!  They took up twice as much space but I'm good with that!  I had no problems with discoloration in the wash even after more than one wash.  They did leave a wet feeling on the outside of the towel like it didn't soak up all the water but that has gotten better with successive washes.  Very happy with these towels!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 2, 2021
Author: NYBritt
Title: They're "fine"
Body: These towels are soft, but are of fairly low quality. Upon the very first wash, 1/2 of them had random strings hanging down from the sides and several of the loops were pulled. Before anyone wonders, I washed them on warm, normal cycle, medium spin, medium dry. I know my laundry, these are fine for the kids, but I won;t them myself.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2021
Author: Wendy
Title: Big No!
Body: These towels after at least 12 washes still leave heavy lint and are low absorption. Check out the photos of my arm and clothes after drying off with them. Pass on these towels. Yes, they look good, are soft and thick, but are not even absorbent enough to make a decent rag. It just smears water around, and leaves a mess on you and anything you touch.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 20, 2021
Author: klos
Title: Literally just threw them in the trash
Body: When I opened them I thought they were nice and soft and a great weight. I washed and dried them and used them the first time after getting out of the shower and noticed that they have this weird tendency to hold onto wetness. I asked my husband his thoughts to see if he found the same thing and he said they were “oddly wet.” I have them one more chance with a second shower and got the same thing. Definitely kills the entire point of them. Like I said in the title I literally just threw them in the trash. Won’t even keep them for backup towels.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2021
Author: Bogey62
Title: Not absorbent & Tons of lint
Body: Yes, they're soft.Yes, they're pretty thick.But, more importantly, they are NOT absorbent! It feels like all of the water just stays on the surface of these towels. You still feel wet and the towel is wet on its surface, making you not want to use it anymore and grab a second one. We're average sized adults too!Finally, after running them through the dryer, they leave a ton of lint behind. Wash after wash. Dryer cycle after dryer cycle. Tons of lint!Not recommended.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 3, 2021
Author: Derek Oung
Title: Sheds like crazy. This item will cause you so much annoyance
Body: If an item is okay, I'm usually pretty happy. This item is not. Its fine with absorbency and feels nice to touch (as you can see with the rating I gave to its features). But all of that doesn't matter when it sheds like crazy.I went down a path of denial because of my usually low expectations. I've washed it twice, hoping it will stop shedding, but it still sheds a crazy amount.I thought the shedding wasn't a big deal. Until every time I took a shower, I had towel lint all over my face and between my cheeks (not on my face). Your crack being itchy is not a pleasant feeling as you're going about your day. You're also transferring all of this lint onto everything else that's in the same load of laundry. This lint even starts to settle on every surface in your bathroom.I don't know what's up with the great reviews. Maybe I was just unlucky and received a bad product, which is what this review is for. If you did buy this, hopefully you had better luck.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 25, 2020
Author: Princess Chanteuse Sparkles Sous Vide
Title: Meh
Body: The towels are soft (No I haven’t washed them yet so God knows what they put on them before they pack them).  The reason I’m giving these towels a mediocre score is because the quality doesn’t seem worth the price and also the color is way off. I ordered moss green which in the picture looks like a pretty forest moss green. The actual color is very much sage. I’ll probably keep them because I’m desperate for towels during the pandemic but I wouldn’t recommend them.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 24, 2021
Author: Deanna M
Title: Not at all what I was wanting.
Body: It's very disappointing that these towels do not live up to all the hype.  I wanted soft, thick, luxurious towels, but instead find myself regretting this purchase.  They are not soft, even after following all recommended care instructions.  They are not thick, just your average towel, nothing special, or luxurious about them.  Maybe I'm just the unlucky one who received four defective towels, but I'm not willing to waste my time or money to find out.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2019
Author: Phillip R
Title: Great towel, good price
Body: These towels are extreemly soft out of the box. They do require three to four wash/dry cycles to remove majority of lose lint. By then they are average in softness. They do dry very well and are a great size in that they fit across most towel bars without having to bunch up or fold.I use Persil detergent and OxyClean White booster to keep them looking good. No fabric softner in the washer or dryer. They are bright white so the smallest amount of soil really shows.I am very happy overall and just purchased another set in a different color :-)

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 4, 2020
Author: Kindle Customer
Title: 5 Star Hotel quality only better!
Body: These towels are amazing. You feel like you're wrapped in a thick blanket coming out of a shower or bath. Definately follow instructions to wash upon arrival and soak in the machine overnight first washing. Makes a huge difference. The fibers fluff up and stay that way after routine washings later. Only wash towels with towels. Seriously makes a difference too. First drying in machine loosens stray fibers from factory. After initial washing this lint becomes less. Being a knitter I understood this process working with natural fiber yarns.  Treat yourself to Spa moments at home and invest in these towels. I'm replacing 3 bathrooms full now after my first purchase of 8 bathtowels. These were perfect the size. Need 12 more and now handtowels and 3 bathmats. You won't regret your purchase. ENJOY.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2021
Author: Lvsr
Title: Liked them very much
Body: I liked these towels just fine for the money. You get a lot of towel for the price, they washed very well and look great. There is a reason “luxury towels”are expensive. It involves weight and weave. My only complaint is is the color.Cranberry should not look brick color, other then that, zIm happy with them.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 19, 2020
Author: Dusty
Title: Great towels!
Body: I will admit I was somewhat apprehensive about purchasing towels without the ability to physically scrutinize them. These towels are terrific. Perfect thickness and size.  In my experience, it took about 3 to 4 washes to get them as “thirsty,” as I would like. Overall experience, so far, is that these towels are exactly what I would have chosen had I gone to a brick and mortar.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 9, 2020
Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Perfect!
Body: I was hoping the towels weren’t as thick as described, and they weren’t!They are perfect! I prefer longer towels without too much width. They were true to size. The color was rich and the absorbency perfect!I don’t understand the bad reviews, as picky as I am, I lived them and will order more!!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 31, 2019
Author: rolbmac
Title: After actually using these for a year and a half....
Body: These are soft and absorbant. That's great, but that's what  any towel should do. The problem is that they are not holding up very well . I would say poorly. With simple use and washings, threads are pulling out in many places. One of them has a hole the size of nickel! How did that get there? I've had other towels last for ten years without that happenning. We'll continue to use them for a while and then relegate the ratty ones as dog towels.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 5, 2019
Author: Ainslee1777
Title: Hotel Quality.
Body: Upon unpacking them I trimmed any little extra threads. I got a little nervous at first seeing this, but I have been using them for months now and they are holding up without fraying. At first- they got super fluffy after washing them.  They have gotten a little less fluffy but I’ve stayed soft and perfectly white (with appropriate washing). Also— my husband and I are average-sized humans and they cover us perfectly when wrapped around us. I seriously love them. They were exactly as advertised. I have been truly shocked at the good quality.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2019
Author: JEFFREY
Title: Forget the others. Buy these.
Body: The second I opened the package and held one of these towels, I knew they were quality. Very heavy and very plush. You really need to wash them once before using, otherwise they are not absorbent, they just move the water around on your body. Will definitely buy these again. I bought a similar set on AZ that said they were 800 GSM (almost as good as it gets in a towel), and these ones are even much better than those.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 11, 2021
Author: Red V
Title: Good Towels
Body: If you're looking for really nice, soft, large, and super absorbent towels; these are not the towels for you. If you are looking for good towels for the $$$, these should be considered.  They are good, but not what I'm looking for.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 18, 2020
Author: Jorge
Title: Nice looking, but not functional
Body: I rarely write reviews but I was driven to by the reaching a tipping point in using these towels for about two weeks. They are horrible at absorbing water. I get out of the shower and try in vain to dry myself in what otherwise should be an after thought. They look and feel great, and as decorative towels they are adequate. I would not purchase again. I gave them two stars because the product is physically fine but functionaly very poor.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 29, 2019
Author: Jennifer
Title: Nice soft towels
Body: Have had a month now and wash weekly. They look nice and are soft. I like that they are more medium thickness, I don’t like towels that are too thick. They are reasonably absorbent, I took one star off because my skin feels slightly damp after drying with these, but I dry completely in a minute or two after so it’s not a big deal. Take a bit to dry in the dryer, but that’s typical for towels. Overall happy.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2020
Author: Sarah
Title: Perfect!!
Body: I was apprehensive at first, I swear by the Fieldcrest towels at Target but they just weren’t keeping their true white and didn’t wash up well.  But these are great!  They aren’t as fluffy as Fieldcrest but they’re super soft, absorbent, wash beautifully and stay white!! I love them!! And you can’t beat the value!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 30, 2021
Author: MommaG
Title: Not enough absorption
Body: Do not absorb at all. I  have washed multiple times now and still find I am not dry when using these towels. Disappointed

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 21, 2021
Author: Vinesha Wimberly
Title: Not Absorbing
Body: The color is a nice color. However these towels did not absorb well at all. When placed on body or floor everything was still wet. I would not recommend.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 11, 2021
Author: JennyJenJen
Title: Beautiful towels
Body: The only problem that I see is that these towels are not as absorbent as I would like. Takes a little longer to dry off.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 13, 2021
Author: Brian in AZ
Title: Nice Towels!
Body: Wonderful towels! Nice and thick just like hotels use. Nice and soft and absorbent. No complaints at all!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 4, 2019
Author: Lauraavon83
Title: They're... Okay.
Body: Eh, they're okay. They're definitely a ton softer than our old towels by a long shot, but I've personally felt softer towels before. They do shed a wild amount of lint in the dryer for their first wash, so do not wash them with anything!!! Not sure about washes moving forward, but I'm going to wash them as their own load just in case.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 14, 2021
Author: ISM
Title: Fluffy, but not good as real hotel or spa towels
Body: Better than anything I've ever had before, but not as fluffy or as plush as I had hoped after reading the other reviews.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 2, 2020
Author: Radmom
Title: Not very absorbent at all, so far...
Body: It's been two days. I love the color. It's very thick and soft. However, it is not very absorbent at all. I'm disappointed, because I really wanted to love these towels.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 2, 2021
Author: Gulmira
Title: Great towels
Body: Amazing quality, just wash them once before use, it’s totally normal for new towels to shed a little, after one wash they are amazing

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 17, 2021
Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Falling apart
Body: Towels towels look nice but every time I wash them and dry them more and more stuff keeps coming off I’m afraid there might not be much left soon

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 25, 2020
Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Better than expected.
Body: Very pleased with these navy blue towels. They are much thicker than I expected and they are very absorbent. Just an FYI-  the first round in the dryer will yield a lot of lint but it did not affect the quality of the towel and there was no change in the color consistency after washing. Because the towels are so thick dry time could take longer (8 of these in the dryer for 40 mins was not enough).

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 10, 2020
Author: MEGAN
Title: Zero absorption. I can air dry faster.
Body: My wife just got out of the shower and said:"you gotta leave a feedback on these towel so the poor and unsuspecting soul out there trying to buy nice towel doesn't get burned."Yeah they suck that bad. No absorption whatsoever.  Soft yes but what good is that if it doesn't serve it's primary purpose.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 18, 2021
Author: Cyn
Title: Thin
Body: These were very thin and the fibers of the towel come off on you . Even after a washing

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 12, 2021
Author: William O.
Title: Great Quality and color
Body: High quality, good price, they keep there shape AND the color is great ….!!!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 28, 2021
Author: FunShop
Title: Poor Quality, only For Tight Budget
Body: How can this item be allowed to advertise as a luxury towel?  Or thick?  They are quite cheap and thin. Do not believe the reviews with 5 stars. I returned the item upon receipt. Others have written about this poor quality. Trust those reviews.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 1, 2019
Author: Sarasri
Title: Good buy
Body: I'm not really sure what the other reviewers were talking about with all the 'lint' they said were coming off of these. I didn't experience any of that and I have washed all of them. They feel nice, very absorbent, dry quickly and they're a very pretty bright white color - I'm just hoping I can keep them that way.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2017
Author: A. Golden
Title: Soft, doesn't mildew, good towels
Body: These are really nice... Don't understand the bad reviews. Not rough at all, extremely soft and dries quickly. My previous towels got the nasty mildew smell after a few uses because they didn't dry well and retained water. That doesn't happen with these.Only con is they take a few swipes to get the water off (doesn't pull it off as quickly as some other towels), but overall I'm very happy with them and at $35 for 4 that's a great price.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 30, 2020
Author: Jenniffer Purtell
Title: Better than my hotel towels!
Body: Great price for great towels. I usually buy towels from my hotel (the one I used to work for). Hotel towels are a bit harsh but they dry really quick without that moist feeling on the towel. I have to say I am surprised that this towel is thick, soft, and dries my skin quickly without that moisture feeling from the towel and the towel itself dries quick too. So worth it!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 22, 2020
Author: mark anthony
Title: Softest towels and they stay that way.
Body: All my life I wanted a towel that was soft and stayed that way long after you used them. These are the very best 👌 by far and the price was right ✅

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 20, 2021
Author: Amazon Customer
Title: DO NOT BUY! Horrible Quality!
Body: Worst towels ever.  DO NOT BUY! They have ruined my other towels.  I washed the towels separate on two occasions after one wash still left lint on my body from drying off. After two washing machine washes, I washed these towels with my other dirty towels on the 3rd wash and the lint from these towel ruined my other towels.  Horrible quality!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 8, 2020
Author: Catherine Baker
Title: Not absorbent
Body: They are thick but they don’t feel like 100% cotton.  They feel like polyester.  They don’t feel warm and absorbent like cotton.  They feel like they have a film on them.  Disappointed.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 28, 2018
Author: Todd Hardison
Title: Really Soft and huge
Body: I finally decided it was time for new towels, mine old ones were years old. I really like these, I got the white ones thinking I would be able to bleach them, now reading the instructions it says don't. But I have washed them a few times and they are great for after the shower.  They are a little heavy so I have to wash them separately but that isn't a problem. I  will be ordering more but prob. the smaller size.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 4, 2021
Author: Deborah J Watkins
Title: Thick and comfy
Body: The towels are beautiful and soft. I love the color (teal). The reduction in stars is because they do bleed quite a bit in the wash. I wrecked some other lighter towels with the fade. So for now at least they get washed separately.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 14, 2020
Author: David
Title: Good towel, not great.
Body: This is a much better towel than the ones I had been using. It’s not as thick as I would like, but it absorbs well.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 14, 2020
Author: sissy
Title: quality towels
Body: towels are soft and appear to be durable.  i bought them so that i can monogram/embroider them for my granddaughter for her college dorm room.  beautiful teal/aqua color.  i also bought the bath cloths/face cloths and the colors matched perfectly even though they were not bought as a set!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 1, 2019
Author: David Koppel
Title: Cheap, thin bath towels deceptively marketed
Body: I bought these because I was looking for premium, fluffy soft towels.  These are things towels that are way overpriced.  They don't even look like the towels in the picture, which are easily twice the thickness.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 8, 2021
Author: mary hosler
Title: soft
Body: makes for great shower time.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 17, 2019
Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Not as luxurious as expected
Body: Not as luxurious as i expected. I get some nice ones from Costco that are plush and soft and absorbent. This seemed like a regular towel, nothing special, but is used for its purpose.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 28, 2020
Author: James Hendrickson
Title: Not very absorbent!
Body: These are soft & luxurious, but not very absorbent - just OK after a few washes!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 11, 2021
Author: Marcy
Title: Great towels!
Body: Holding up well after multiple washes! They’re thick and soft too!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2021
Author: Desire Carter
Title: Worth it!
Body: This towels are great value feels like a nice Hilton hotel towel it’s very thick but light weight and it absorbent and soft will be ordering so much more

Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 17, 2020
Author: Melody Monroe
Title: Dissatisfied
Body: I received my navy blue towels about a month ago and immediately noticed a weird smell.. almost like a burnt undertone. I Have washed the towels a few times now and the smell is still there. Also I just noticed that on at least one of the four I received, there is a line of fabric that is coming out in strands almost as if it’s unraveling. I’m not satisfied for the amount paid. They are soft and fairly thick but the smell and now falling apart is not my idea of good quality towels. Very disappointed

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 7, 2020
Author: Kevin
Title: Not happy with purchase.
Body: The towels have been used through 4 cycles of wash and dryer dry.  ( without fabric softener).  Still not drying better or feeling softer.  Still filling up the lint basket and there are now missing sections of fiber.Would not buy again.  Next use is for a drop cloth.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2021
Author: pnblbob
Title: Low quality
Body: Advertised as hotel quality. My question is what hotel? Don't think I would stay there.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2020
Author: Bubba
Title: Nonabsorbent for 100% cotton
Body: Cannot get these towels to absorb water. Like drying off with a wet towel. Towels have been through thirteen wash cycles, three with Dawn dish soap with very little improvement. Not sure what 100% Turkish cotton is, but it's certainly not like the dozens of other 100% cotton towels I have.The product is very well made and looks of very good quality.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 1, 2020
Author: RiffRaff
Title: NOT 54" X 27"
Body: I like these towels.  However, after washing in warm and drying on warm they shrunk.  They are now barely 51" X  25"..  Doesn't seem like a lot until you use them.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 24, 2020
Author: Michelle
Title: did they give me different towels?
Body: I definitely do not have a great photo for this. But i bought a pack of 4 towels. I was expecting them to be really thick and soft.. and one of them is. However, the other three are thinner, and after a wash felt like extremely rough and cheap. Really wondering if they gave me a different towels because that’s how different they feel. (The photo doesn’t show it, but even the colors are slightly different) (They’ve all also been washed in the same load, same amount of times)

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 19, 2020
Author: Madly
Title: Definitely buying more
Body: Super soft, washed well. No fading, no bunching, fraying, or pilling. Oversized, but still perfect size. Well worth the price, so far. Last set I bought from another brand, those didn't even make it through the first wash.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 22, 2016
Author: Jason K.
Title: [2021]Hem tore after two washes  [2016]Good Towels -- Solid Purchase
Body: [2021 review] Bought my second set of these towels, five years after the first. Original set are worn and not fluffy but still absorbent. This new set started to fray after just two washes. "Support website" of provider is under construction. Not impressed.[2016 review]I am happy with these. They are at the top end of Hotel Quality towels. Fairly absorbent, have washed them a few times now and they stay pretty puffy. Haven't frayed. Good sense of value. Would buy again.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 13, 2020
Author: Danielle Seeley
Title: Great purchase!
Body: A softer "moss green" than illustrated it the photo..Very nice color..I was pleasantly surprised 😮 😅 😊

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 25, 2019
Author: mmancc11399
Title: Lots of lint
Body: Nice towels for the price but they leave lint everywhere. I’ve washed them multiple times and I still get covered in lint when I dry off after a shower.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 13, 2020
Author: Anthony
Title: Leaves Lint EVERYWHERE
Body: These towels do their job but lint CONSTANTLY falls off of them. After you dry your body you have blue lint all over the place. Even when you wash it following the washing instructions it clogs the washer and dryer with blue lint. I don’t recommend these at all.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 18, 2020
Author: Serenity Now!!!
Title: Fluffy and soft♥️
Body: Perfect size, fluffy, soft and absorbent. Great quality. Will buy again from this seller. Shipped fast too!!  Wry appy with this item.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 18, 2020
Author: mania
Title: Luxury towels!!
Body: Very luxurious for the price. Great color like a denim blue medium.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 10, 2020
Author: terri
Title: Great quality and great price
Body: When I pulled them out of the box they were flat and it looked like you could see through them, I was disappointed but I decided keep them, so I washed and died them and when they came out of the drier, they were soft, they were thick very little lint in the filter and nothing rolling off when I dried after bathing

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 20, 2020
Author: Keri A. Sardone-Higby
Title: Great Towels
Body: The towels are comfortable, however be sure to wash them first to make every softer. The absorbency is very good.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 14, 2015
Author: Tina
Title: FABULOUSLY Thick and plush, but careful when drying...
Body: I am EXTREMELY happy with my new towels. I cannot recall ever owning such a thick/plush/soft towel. I have my own regrets in not paying attention to my timing when I laundered them, as the dobby trim did shrink them a bit (for I did not realize how sensitive the material was to even a low minimal heat since the tag only specified "tumble dry low"), but I guess that was my error that I will have to live with until my next order.My only disappointment was the constant changes that I was receiving in regards to the shipping... I had a short time of 'turn around' from order to my door originally (of just days), then it was pushed out two weeks, yet I received them a week after ordering them. With that type of confusion, it gives cause of concern at this end to assure that they can be received without issues. Other than that, I would recommend these towels to anyone and everyone for they truly are worth the investment (thus far).

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 24, 2021
Author: Tanna O.
Title: You won’t be disappointed
Body: I was scared to pay this much but wanted a luxury feel for my Airbnb guests. Well worth the money folks. Very luxurious z

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 18, 2020
Author: Trishdalish
Title: Great quality
Body: Great quality! The burgundy ones ended up more of a tomato red, but I still like them!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 12, 2016
Author: JKapp
Title: Goldilocks of Towels
Body: Bath towels are one of our most-used household item, put to use virtually every day.  These towels are bright white, soft, and a generous size.  Add 1 cup of vinegar to the fabric softener dispenser when washing.  After the first wash, they were lint-free.  Will order them again.There are cheaper towels and more expensive towels, but there's no need to buy either.  These are the Goldilocks of towels.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 21, 2020
Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Horrible towels!
Body: These towels are the worse you are just air drying yourself you can’t even wipe counter it just moves the water around thanks for nothing! there would be no stars but amazon needed a star I guess to add review

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 7, 2020
Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Nice
Body: Good size nice thickness but shrank up at the band stitching causing to loose shape.  Should have spent a little more for better quality.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 18, 2020
Author: Rydia Skylar
Title: Terrible towels that do NOT dry your body
Body: These towels are HORRIBLE. Do not buy them. They do NOT dry you off. The towel itself gets wet when you attempt to dry yourself and it takes forever. Very annoyed I wasted money on these. Do not buy.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 27, 2019
Author: Dorothy Hamlin
Title: Towels don’t last
Body: I expected a better quality of towels like the SPA quality, strength, and feel.  I could have gotten this type in WalMaet.These won’t last long dure to the poor quality.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 29, 2021
Author: Nicole Hill
Title: Not absorbent at all 😢
Body: These towels are so soft but do not dry you off at all. It’s like drying with a wet towel the whole time. I was very surprised.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 8, 2020
Author: Michael Frediani
Title: Terrible Towels
Body: These are terrible towels. Washed them before using and noticed that they filled up the lint collector in the dryer, and then it left lint all over my body when I dried myself. Had to use a second different towel that I’ve had for awhile to get dried off. I washed again and the same thing. They aren’t even good enough to use on my dog 😡

Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2020
Author: NCH
Title: Luxury Towels!
Body: Great towels! We have purchased more expensive towels in the past but I like these as much or more! Nice weight and wash well.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 22, 2017
Author: Mark Twain
Title: Good towels so far
Body: I am not a fan of huge, crazy thick towels, These are neither. I was a little worried they weren't very absorbent after first wash and use. After the second wash they became a lot more absorbent, guess they got the new knocked off them. Can't speak about longevity yet, but so far so good.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 25, 2020
Author: David Gerren
Title: Not as plush of a towel that I would normally buy
Body: The color was great and held through the first wash. However it had MAJOR sheading in the drier, I cleared the drier lint filter four times while drying. The bottom line is the towel is not bad, however has the density of a towel that I would normally buy after it had been used for more than a year.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 4, 2021
Author: Elad
Title: one fine bath towel
Body: this is a superior  bath towel...will buy again

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 29, 2018
Author: dogmom
Title: Pampering with Thirsty Softnes
Body: What do I like?  I like everything about these towels, because they are super soft and super thirsty. Want to dry yourself in luxury? Try one of these Turkish Cotton Bath Towels... you will be so pleased!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 19, 2014
Author: Graymor
Title: very nice towels for the money
Body: Love them. We have washed them several times, used them a lot, and have no negatives to offer. They feel thick and soft to the touch, have weight to them when you wrap them around you, and do a good job of absorbing moisture. They also dry well when hung, and appear to be of a construction that will last. Different color choices (other than white) would possibly be worth offering, but we wanted white anyway. I would definitely recommend these without hesitation

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 24, 2015
Author: DougieFresh
Title: Excellent towels and a great value
Body: Definitely met my expectations. Excellent value. Soft, absorbent and well made. Fluffy after initial washing and what I would consider a good weight. I would agree that these towels are in line with what you would expect at a nice hotel. Luxury? Well, I thought another reviewer summed it up nicely by saying for $10 a towel these are nice towels. They are not what I would expect from a $40 bath sheet, but they are, I believe, a solid purchase.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 16, 2020
Author: kyle higgins
Title: Terrible
Body: I have never written a review before in my life but had to for these towels. Absolute hot trashed. These things couldnt absorb water to save their lives. They also shed very bad, I ordered blue ones and had blue fibers all over my body even after washing them before using.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2020
Author: Misty
Title: Thin and rough not soft at all!
Body: Thin, rough, not soft at all. I wanted something thick soft and fluffy. This is not it. In the pictures it is folded over several times to make it look thick.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 28, 2015
Author: Indigo Girl
Title: Soft Touch Linen ROCKS!
Body: BEST Turkish towels I've ever used.  Along with their hand towels and washcloths.  White is clean, and clean is sexy!  Ordering their robes next.  Could use some more colors though.  Gave some as gifts also.  Don't get confused with the company out of China huihi  There is absolutely NO comparison  I've already called Amazon for a refund  They were really bad cheap towels.  Soft Touch Linen is thr best!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 14, 2015
Author: ADudePlayingADude
Title: Nice towel!
Body: Luxury Hotel & Spa Bath Towel 100% Genuine Turkish Cotton, 27" x 54" ,Set of 4,White.I was hesitant to order towels online, but was pleasantly surprised by these. Absorbent and plenty thick. Big enough for a guy. Make sure you wash and dry it in a washer/drier a couple of times to remove the lint before using, and don't ever wash the white ones with colored clothes.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 23, 2015
Author: B M
Title: Great towels, great price.
Body: We bought these towels to replace our colored towels that have seen better days.  Our condo has hard water that takes a toll on our linens.  Now we can bleach these towels which will make our situation much better.  These towels are very good quality at least 1/2 price of the towels found at the better box stores.  Going to.buy another pack of these along with some wash clothes as well.  Very happy customer!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 29, 2015
Author: Dr. V
Title: Excellent purchase
Body: Very high quality and the price is extremely reasonable.  I've always thought towels didn't really make a major difference but I have seen the light.  3+ weeks of using these towels and my mornings have become less dreadful due to my post-shower experience.  Very surprised how much I love them and glad my girlfriend recommended them. Only change I would have made is to buy the gray ones because I prefer the color.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2019
Author: Maria
Title: Soft and luxurious towels
Body: I’ve had these towels for almost two years and they are still in excellent condition. They are very soft and made to last but are NOT lightweight (in case you are seeking that).

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2020
Author: June Lehmann
Title: Very disappointed!
Body: Was very disappointed.....the picture shows a very plush towel. This was not the case...could have purchased the same quality at Target for a cheaper price.  Luxury? Not quite!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2018
Author: Bahati Banks
Title: No lint cotton towel
Body: I’d been researching best cotton, no lint towels when I fell for this great deal. After washing them in cold water they obviously left lint in the dryer filter, but nothing outrageous. Just used one this morning and they are soft, big/fluffy, and didn’t leave any lint on my body. I opted for white.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2020
Author: Mike
Title: Disappointed
Body: These bathtowels are no more soft nor absorbent than what I have purchased at Wal-Mart and probably less absorbent than the towels which I purchased at Target.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 17, 2015
Author: karen
Title: she said she felt guilty having something so nice, we've never seen a towel so nice even ...
Body: These are the nicest towels we have ever in our life used.  we an interesting reason for buying them, our son's bed the mattress was too hard , so we wanted to buy an organic mattress pad but they were so expensive so we bought these.  we ended up buying another set of these because they were so soft that my wife wants them to dry her hair , because her hair has been falling out from an illness and they are so incredibly gentle and soft on her hair.  she said  she felt guilty having something so nice, we've never seen a towel so nice even in hotels.

Title: I Wanted Luxury and I Got It

I have washed them several times and there was no shrinkage.These met all my criteria, and I wouldn't hesitate to buy these towels, and the matching wash cloths, for someone as a gift. They are pure luxury.

I liked the first purchase so much, I got another one since then since I was getting tired of having to wash them so often.

I also noticed that one of the towels had a large snag.  The 100% Turkish cotton may be an exaggerated claim as they are not as "luxurious" as stated, but priced ok for the quality.  Like the color.

Exactly what I was looking for in towels at a great price point. Will be back with an update in a few months to see what the condition is after more washes.

Long lasting and have survived multiple washes.One significant downside I find with almost all towels is their "softness" these are better than average but still are on the stiff side. Boston store has some pretty good towels for about 14/towel that are a bit superior if at a premium

It happens -- overall I'm very pleased with the quality and would compare them to expensive department store brands.

I bought some a few months ago and they hold up really well going through the washing machine and dryer every couple of days! Still as thick as when they were new.

Title: not to absorbent
Body: Look great, feel great but they dont  absorb the water when you try to dry off. I am hoping after a few more washes they will get better

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 21, 2015
Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Great $10 Bath Towels
Body: I had my doubts buying discount towels online, even thought it's Amazon, and even though it has really good reviews.  I was quite pleasantly surprised with my purchase.  They are white, they're clean (no lose strings or poor seams), and most of all they are SOFT and nice and Big.  As I said, I honestly had high doubts about the quality size, and softness of the towels.  I expected to get these off white ragedy towels that could strip my skin right off.  Instead I opened the box and found 4 full sized bath towels that were quite soft.  Granted they aren't Terry Cloth by any means, and they aren't some crazy 700 thread count, they are still great for a towel that you bought off of Amazon.com for a whole ($40?) bucks.  I'm sure if you went down to a local department store you could find towels perhaps on sale and perhaps a touch softer, but given the convenience and 2 day shipping I don't think this can be beat for someone that has just moved into a new home, or for someone that is perhaps elderly or disabled or just does not enjoy getting out of the house and dealing with people.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 14, 2019
Author: Just saying..
Title: Excellent Towels
Body: Excellent towels soft well made. They will last forever. & every time I wash they keep getting softer love these.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2019
Author: Bearguy
Title: Great, but not for long
Body: Just gorgeous, thick, absorbent. 8 months later - no more. turned thin. I wish they lasted - out of the box I was thrilled. WASH THEM AND DRY FIRST.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 22, 2015
Author: S. Cols
Title: Great Towels!
Body: Got 8 of these towels yesterday, they felt very nice right out of the package, just a little flattened. I immediately washed and dried them (4 at a time) on a wam wash cycle and High dryer heat. I have a large capacity washer and dryer but didn't want to overload them. Based on some comments here about lint, I set a timer for 15 minutes to clean the lint filter. It wasn't very full, but I continued to remove the lint every 15-20 minutes.  I compared the washed and dried towels and washcloths to an unwashed one, there was very little shrinking, less than 1" over the entire length and width of the towel, even less for the washcloth. The towels looked and felt wonderful, fluffier after coming out of the dryer. The border did not shrink so the towel lays flat.  But the final test was after my shower last night: the towel was just the right weight: not so thick that it just pushed the water around on your skin, not so thin that it felt like a cheap hotel. It seems perfect. Of course, I've only had them for 1 day, but so far, I am really pleased with these towels. I have already suggested to my daughter that she remove the expensive towels on her wedding registry and get these instead.  Glad I came across these on amazon. Highly recommend.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 15, 2018
Author: B. Young
Title: Turned pink after washing white towels alone..
Body: They turned spotty pink all over after wash. Bought them to leave in bathrooms for an open house but will likely trash them

Author: Ryan Schlottmann
Title: Poor quality - Ripped
Body: My towel ripped while using after only 2 months of use. Would NOT recommend.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 24, 2018
Author: rose
Title: Great Towels
Body: I have had these towel since 2016. They still feel like spa towels.  It is luxurious like they say.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2015
Author: Costero
Title: Meh; last time I'll buy towels without first-hand touch-and-feel
Body: I recently bought some Fieldcrest bath towels at Target for $11 each (and that was before coupon savings which knocked $25 off my $100 purchase), so I am comparing these to those. The verdict: These "Luxury" towels are smaller, lighter in weight, and not as soft as the Fieldcrest, but they are slightly more absorbent.The biggest disappointment is the size: These are not as large as advertised. After one washing, they measure 26" x 52" (*not* the 27" x 54" shown in the listing description). Overall, I think these are OK towels, but they certainly don't meet my definition of "luxury," and they aren't a special bargain at $10 each.Btw, my headline comment about buying online is not meant as a criticism of Amazon or this seller. I love love LOVE Amazon, and make hundreds of purchases here each year. But if you're fussy (as I am) about your towels, I think you need to touch, hold, feel, handle them in person. Photos on a website just aren't the same.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 22, 2015

Title: We have used the towels for a week and are very absorbent and a good size. I am 6'5' and the towel is ...

Title: Exactly as advertised

Body: These towels are the best ones we have in our house, they are soft, absorbent and white which makes them the easiest to get clean with a small amount of clorox, these get used the most in our rotation, I have other white ones that are less then a year old and already thin and do not absorb.  I will be buying another set of these very soon.

Author: KAE
Title: Fabulous set!
Body: Bought this along with another set of towels so I could compare.  These are soft, thick and low lint.  I love these just as much!  Definitely hotel quality and would be a great house warming or wedding gift; as well as for your personal everyday use!  Love them!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2015
Author: Mark
Title: These are pretty nice towels that made me realize my other towels were bad
Body: These are pretty nice towels. They have more fluff and mass than some of the other towels I was using before, and I greatly prefer them for drying off after showers. They also air dry pretty well, so I find them ready to use each morning - I don't have to do the washer+dryer thing with these very often at all. It did take a few wash+dry cycles to kill off all of the lint-y towel fiber residue that was being left behind after drying myself off, but that wasn't too annoying.Four stars because they didn't change my life as dramatically as some 5-star reviews led me to believe they would. They're a bit pricy, but I wouldn't hesitate to buy them again if I were towel-less and needed more towel in my life. Definitely nicer than towels I've seen at stores like Walmart.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 23, 2015
Author: R. Wagner
Title: If you like those really great hotel towels, then these are for you
Body: Second purchase of these towels.  Very happy with the feel and quality of the towels.  They wash well and are soft, absorbent and heavy.  After first run through the dryer they do not produce any more lint than any other towel.  Hems, seems and borders are tight and well constructed.  A few loose threads (not on each towel, but on the 8 towels I've purchased so far), but nothing other than very minor finishing issue (not related to any defect or quality issue).  These are every bit as good as towels sold at the big department stores or specialty bed + bath stores, but at 20% to 25% of the dept store price.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 17, 2020

Title: I am using this product everyday, and I am happy!
Body: I like thick and large!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 12, 2014
Author: M. Barton
Title: 3 out of 4 towels was dissapointing
Body: Of the 4 towels I received after the first wash, the border of 1 towel disintegrated completely. Making the towel useless. They are nice towels and if you actually received 4 good towels in the package the would be a good value. 3 out of 4 towels makes them a poor value. If you're reading the reviews like I did, I would tell you to look elsewhere. I would appreciate a new towel to replace the ruined one. Let's see how the vendor responds to this review. If they take care of this issue I will re-review the purchase. Would I recommend these towels? Only if you have a sense of adventure when you order things.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 11, 2017
Author: Morgon
Title: Nice bath towels, just wish they were longer.
Body: These are advertised as 27" x 54", however mine are only 50" long. I followed care instructions, so I don't think I shrunk them (and it shouldn't have been by that much). If they were the full 54" length, they'd be fantastic.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2018
Author: Margaret Cheek
Title: Three Stars
Body: Not absorbent even after washing. After using many times, I feel the towels are not COTTON. The label reads 100% TURKISH COTTON, however I seriously doubt it - it's more like POLYESTER! I believe it to be FAKE!

Lol, they pass my "Shower Door" test... with my favorite shower at the gym, I have to fold my old towels to close the glass shower door, with this towel I don't need to fold it at all and it's almost too thick.

These are not luxury towels, no one will compliment you on them, you will not feel like these are special. They are neither thin nor thick, and the seams will fray a bit after washing; nothing that can't be cut away. These are average towels in almost all ways.

Title: Not recommended. Must wash a number of times before use.
Body: When washing these for the first time and then drying, they produced so much lint and loose fibers that it is simply a nightmare to deal with. We aren't talking just a normal amount, it is literally small handfuls each time I try using them. I wouldn't be surprised if dusting became a thing you have to do more often due to these towels. Not recommended. Once washed, can't return. Buyer beware!Update: After washing these towels 5 times they have finally stopped putting off lint. Since I was not able to return this naturally happened and have since given three stars instead of one star on this review.

So I was surprised at the lack of lint in the first washing.  A lot less than what I expected there to be but again, they just aren't that soft and fluffy.  Seems like the varying reviews may mean it's an inconsistent product.  Maybe in production, some batches are better than others?

Body: Size and feel of finer "hotel" towels. Will buy more. What makes them much less expensive is that they do not have nearly as a thick of a placard, or center. Hotel towels get washed daily. Home towels far, far, far less. These should hold up well. Advise an initial washing due to lint.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 6, 2016
Author: culturejamming
Title: Not impressed at all
Body: I should have paid more attention to the 1- and 2-star reviews but I figured there were more than enough positive reviews to counterbalance the negative ones.  These towels are marketed as being something special, something you're treating yourself with.  They aren't.  They are above-average in softness.  They are below-average in absorbency.  My old, tired, stiff, bleach-stained towels from years ago work way better than these when drying off after a shower.  The new Chakir towels leave a film of moisture on my body so I stand in front of the window AC unit briefly to finish the job.  This is probably the biggest fault and the primary reason I'm rating 2-stars, because bath towels have one job - to dry you off, and these do not accomplish even that.  They don't feel very substantial.  I wouldn't say they are thin, but they are thinner.  I can't comment on durability yet because I just received the towels last week but I will be sure to update down the road with how they're holding up.  They're not very large towels either.  I'm a 5'9" slightly chubby male and this is by no means a beach towel or something I could cover my body with.  It wraps around my waist and goes down to about my knees with not a whole lot of towel to spare.  Overall, I'm disappointed and wish I would have just gone to a local store like Target or Boscovs to pick up the same thing for probably less money.

The company fixed the issue by notifying the manufactures and sending me a new set of towels free of charge. Thank you so much. I changed my review from one star to five stars, because the towels are just what I wanted and the company took care of my concerns.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 17, 2015
Author: TNcnsmr
Title: The size is large enough to satisfy even my husband
Body: I was a bit nervous about ordering towels. So many expensive towels are soft, but not so absorbent, or tend to get scratchy after a few washings, or they shrink out of shape if they are 100% cotton. Being on a time crunch, I went ahead and ordered and kept my fingers crossed. These towels are not as expensive as many I've purchased in the past, but they are everything I could want in a bath towel. They are very absorbent, very soft, and come out of the dryer feeling and looking brand new. The size is large enough to satisfy even my husband, and that is saying a lot! He only likes using over-sized bath towels, and these ones more than meet his expectations. I don't usually rave about something so basic as a bath towel, but these ones deserve all the good things one can say about them!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 6, 2015
Author: Ahmed Himeidi
Title: Very nice towels that feel soft to the touch
Body: I decided to try a set of these towels, and after just a couple of days with them, I am planning to order more (but in a different color). The cotton is soft, even after washing. The towels are generously sized. Perhaps most importantly, this whole set costs less than just two bath towels from the clearance section at other retail stores.As soon as they arrived, my 5 yr old daughter felt the cotton and claimed the whole set (hence the need to buy more)!As is to be expected with genuine Turkish cotton, they are not as "thirsty" as some other towels. What you give in absorbency, though, you gain in softness.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 19, 2021
Author: Crystal
Title: Disappointed
Body: I’m not happy w these towels. I thought it would be thicker. It’s cheap and you can feel it’s cheap. I prefer to pay for a cheap towel knowing I’m getting a cheap kind than  pay  50$ to discover it’s not worth it.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 18, 2014
Author: Jeff Lebowski
Title: so far so good. Overall
Body: I have purchased this towel set three times, so they're obviously worth the price. Few notes:1. They shed- I have to wash and dry these towels alone (particularly the drying) to avoid getting the balls of cotton on my other items. This trait lasts for multiple washes, so I've just taken to washing all the towels at once- but it's something I didn't anticipate.2. They are towel size- not bath sheets. Just as described in the posting, they are regular sizes towels.3. They are soft and relatively durable. In my first order (of eight), one towel immediately fell to pieces. The other seven were OK, and I didn't want to deal with any exchange. In this last order (of four), so far so good.Overall, I don't have a need for luxury, but these are definitely good enough for government work.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 26, 2014
Author: Michael C.
Title: Two very satisfied customers!
Body: When traveling, the wife and I enjoy using the hotel provided luxury quality towels. We thought, why not purchase some of these towels for our everyday use, so I started checking them out online. What I found was that high quality towels are very expensive.I do a lot of shopping on Amazon, so when we saw these towels for sale, with such a high customer satisfaction rating, at such a reasonable price we thought we needed to give them a try. We received them the other day, washed them and used them for the first time after this mornings shower. All we can say is they are everything we had hoped they would be and are probably the most absorbent and luxurious towels we have ever used. You will not be disappointed if you purchase this product!

I would order them again and definitely recommend them. Great value, especially for the price!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2021
Author: Elle O.
Title: Absorbent, Fluffy, Thick, Well-Made, but the Pink... read this review if you're considering Pink
Body: These are nice towels at this price point. I just refuse to buy super-expensive towels, so I've been searching for months to find towels that were thick, fluffy, cotton, absorbent, and decent looking. These towels are all of that, and they are not meant to be the center of my design universe. They're just supposed to serve a purpose, and IMO, they do that quite well. I followed the instructions, washed them first in a scent-free detergent, no fabric softener, and dried them on low with some fluff balls in the dryer. They came out perfect. I used two immediately, and they were quite up to the task.BUT, if you are a person considering the pink and looking for a specific shade or range of shades, then this is for you:The pink is sort of a muted melted strawberry ice cream color, with perhaps a touch of chocolate syrup melted in with it. It is not an icy or blue pink, but it is also not a clear pink. I was hoping for a truer, more spa-like pink-- not baby-girl pastel, just a clear pink. Is the pink awful? No. I'm not going to send them back because I need the towels way more than I am disenchanted with the color. I think that they'll be fine. While I might not have chosen the pink originally if I'd seen it in person, I could see myself potentially ordering more of these since I'm already done this primrose path. I might try mixing them with the beige IF the beige is more ivory-like and less tan.Overall, especially at this price point, I would recommend these towels.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 20, 2019
Author: Kathryn Magendie
Title: So soft - and the price is super reasonable!
Body: I am so happy I ordered these towels! I am phasing out my really nice red towels that are just getting too old, and this time going for all white, so I spent some time looking at towels and their reviews.These are a bargain at under $9 a piece (at time of this review). I wanted the 27x54, which is a little larger than the red towels I have had for years. They are the perfect size.I washed them first in warm water and dried them on normal drying temperatures. There was some white fluff in the lint trap but I expected that. There is no lint on my body when I dry with them, nor any pilling. As well, if there was any shrinking, I didn’t notice or care, and the stitching/band didn’t draw up so you have that weird smaller ends—that’s a big plus for me as the white towels I bought a few years ago shrink at the stitching/band.Super super soft! And very absorbent.If these last for years, I’ll be so happy.I love them enough that I want to order 4 more, plus washcloths and hand towels—I was waiting to see if I really liked them first before I committed to more. And reading good reviews from those who have had them longer, I’m encouraged.For a reasonably-priced towel set of 4, these really soft comfy towels are worth it.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 11, 2020
Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Best towels I've ever used
Body: I purchased these towels six months ago. They are well used in my home. My first impression was that they are significantly softer than any towel I've had previously. Once they are washed a few times, they become more absorbent but do not ever lose their softness. I feel comfortable wiping my face off with these towels, instead of just dabbing dry (wiping your face with a regular towel is not good for your skin). They are very thick as well, and remain thick after washing and after many many uses. I would highly recommend this product. It is worth every penny.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 22, 2021
Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Disappointed
Body: I bought these towels and I really liked them... so I bought 4 more. I'm super disappointed because the second batch are not the same towels. They are thin and scratchy. I'm so confused how I buy a product that is great go back to buy it again and its not the same. Defect? Trick? Not sure which one but for $40 bucks I can go to any store and buy towels. Why shop here where I can't confirm the product and get a poor product after receiving a good product? Hmmm... very confusing.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2021
Author: James C.
Title: Best towels I have owned
Body: I purchased towels in the past from a home store for a lot more money. These Turkish bath towels are just heavy enough and really soft and absorbent. You can not beat the price for what you get! Turkish cotton is known for their absorbency. I live in Florida where it is humid and takes things forever to dry. These towels dry quickly. I love the soft thick feel of these towels and the quality is really excellent! I highly recommend them and I am buying four more today.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 8, 2021
Author: lacoolkid
Title: These are the only towels you need
Body: Turkish textiles have always been superior and these are no exception.  Even though the towels come clean, they recommend washing before use.  Once you wash them, they become gigantic and fluffy clouds of magic. They are so white and so clean (bought the white ones) you feel like you are at a fancy hotel each time you bathe. I highly recommend this brand and will continue to shop exclusively for these towels.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 1, 2021
Author: Huneydew13
Title: Best Towels For The 💰
Body: I searched forever for a soft towel at a great price. I wanted to wait a few months before submitting a review.  After lots of use, wash, drying…here it is!These towels are so worth the money!!!  After going through the wash cycle they have held up great, no fraying, no pulls!  I have dried these n the dryer and outdoors on the line with no problems.They are the perfect length to wrap around after getting out the shower.  They are very absorbent and continue to be soft.  I will definitely be purchasing in the future for more!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2021
Author: Enraged WereDonkey
Title: Fantastic.
Body: These towels are thick, super absorbent, and quite soft / comfortable.  As someone with sensitive skin, I love 'em.  The fabric is quite gentle on my skin.  The quality of the fabric is quite nice, as well.  While they are not 'ultra premium luxury hotel towels', they are still a high quality towel at a great price.  They are a fantastic value.  I've bought 3 sets of these because I don't want to run out in case they get discontinued or something.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 6, 2020

Title: Big towels.
Body: I ordered 4 in the red/orange color they are very thick but the color was way off from what I was expecting still orange but more of a sherbet then a darker blood red orange. I washed them first b4 I use anything and they are still very long thick towels. So I'm happy. I seen other reviews and idk what they got or from whom but I'm happy minus the color being a tad off. 2 will be used 2 are for decoration.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 11, 2021
Author: PepperthePup
Title: Excellent quality
Body: I immediately washed these in cold water and tumbled dry low and they fluffed up perfectly. Fluff in dryer was not overwhelming, second dry there was very little. Absorbs well, looks nice.My only complaint is the size 27 x 54.  I wish they were 30x56.But for this type of excellent quality, I will live with it.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 15, 2021

Title: These towels seem to be thick and absorbent.  Hoever.....
Body: These seems to be a need to wash them first before initial usage.  This is really stupid.  They should run them through a wash cycle before shipping them not require the end consumer to do this work for them.  After washing them in hot water, they do seem better.  But this should be done before  shipping occurs and before Amazon purchases these towels.

After 8 washes and dries the lint is everywhere. These are not Lucy towels and I am send information mine back. If they will take th since I washed and dried them 8 times. Never used on anything or anyone.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 9, 2021
Author: Debra
Title: Super soft but doesn’t absorb water
Body: These would be the perfect blanket. They are warm and cozy until you are wet. Then it feels like the fabric is just smearing around the water on your skin. I thought it was just me but my husband independently said the same thing about the towels. It’s super weird. When it does that it makes the towels cold cause it’s almost like the water sits on the edge of it instead of soaking in.I’m hoping maybe it will go away after a few washes, but 2 washes in it still feels the same.

Body: Towels arrived I was excited how soft they were. Placed in washer in gentle cycle and than to dryer on low heat... as a result I got a large lump of lint. This is just from 4 bath towels. The towel are now rough and when used they are horrible at absorbing water.

Title: Luxury Hotel & Spa 100% Cotton Premium Turkish Bath Towels, 27"
Body: I'm very dissatisfied with this product. I used several towels and they are NOT absorbent as the claim to be. This towels are not like the hotel towels 100% absorbent. Even do the striker shoes that they are 100% cotton they do not dry. Please don't tell me to wash them before I use them, because I did wash them.

Body: but they were really comfortable right out of the box. Now I'm not saying that if you paid a hundred bucks a towel you wouldn't be happier with them but I bought a couple dozen of these towels and I consider them well worth the dough. If you don't wash them before you first use them It takes two or three showers before you get pretty much full absorbency.

Body: So soft and fluffy! My boyfriend wanted soft towels so I read and researched and found these and took a chance.  Washed them as soon as they came and put one out for him. After his shower his words were, “I love the towels. You need to buy more!”.  Absorbent too.

Author: Stefanie
Title: A good towel with a big color selection
Body: I think you can get a better deal on towels just as nice at Costco.  However, these come in 14 different colors, which you never find such a good selection in big stores on towels this nice.  If the color matters to you I think it’s worth it.  I had no problem at all with lint or other quality issues.  It’s a good decent towel.  Pretty soft and study seeming.  If your worried about the negative reviews just check the return policy before you order.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 16, 2020

Title: Absorbent Towels
Body: I waited quite awhile to write a review so I could see how these towels held up.  I was very happy with the quality of these towels.  The only thing with these towels is that they still have so much fuzz in the dryer when it stops and I thought that by now it would have stopped.  You will not go wrong with these towels and I am very happy with this purchase.  Thank you for making a quality towel.

Body: I ordered two colora and my husband washed them together in cold water and they both faded into the other. They look fine and are so super soft. I can ring my hair out with one side of the towel and the other side doesn’t even get wet. That’s how thick these babies are! 💜💜

What a waste of money, so disappointing for the price. Don’t even want to have those out for our guests... not sure what to do with them. Incredibly unimpressed.

Title: Poor quality
Body: It’s anything but a luxury towel. Please don’t lie to people. The towels look great and they match my bathroom, but the quality is horrible. I used it three times and every time it left fluffs on my body even thought I had washed it before.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 14, 2018
Author: polaris
Title: They shed too much
Body: They are very smooth and seem durable but the overall rating shown for this item in the description page seems wrong.Drawbacks:1) They seem a bit too fluffy and I feel like they don't dry your skin as good as they should but definitely not the worst.2) DON'T PUT THEM IN THE WASHING MACHINE WITH ANYTHING ELSE!!!. These towels shed a lot of their material and you will get white stuff stuck on everything. The pockets in all my pants are filled with that stuff and it's impossible to get them off. Giving 2 stars mainly for that. I would not recommend nor would I buy them again.

It's not a bad color but it definitely doesn't match the color of the advertisement, therefore it's not matching what I already had. Body: I have to be honest and say that I was reluctant to purchase these...but man am I glad I listened to the reviewers here and purchased anyway! If you are looking for quality then look no further! These are every bit as wonderful as described. This is a great investment! Go ahead and give in to yourself...just throw in the towel already and buy some! Haha, pun intended ;)

The only reason I didn’t give 1 star, is because these are so dang soft. I didn’t wash them, as I’m not keeping them, but the softest leaves me even more bummed about the color!

Body: I'm confused as to how the towels received good reviews. After washing and drying the towels twice before using, I had assumed they should be ready for everyday use. The towels are awful. They don't absorb any water when your drying off and I was covered in lint.

Title: Quality
Body: A long hunt ends in a great towel. These are what you want in a premium bath towel. After trying to make due with cheaper blends  and “new” materials there is just no substitute for high quality.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 6, 2021
Author: Darlene
Title: These are Great towels.
Body: I really love these bath towels.  They are so soft and they are very absorbent.  The purple color is beautiful.  I would buy them again and will definitely be back for more in the future.  Happy customer!
