Author: Didier Chavarria Ch
Title: No tiene gran absorvencia
Body: El grosor y la calidad es la indicada. Sin embargo respecto a la absorvencia, no es la indicada y la esperada según las especificaciones dada por el vendedor.No recomendaría el producto, ya que me quedaron debiendo en ese tema. He encontrado de mejor absorvencia en Wallmart y a mejor precio.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 7, 2020
Author: Corie
Title: BEST towels by far
Body: These towels are the BEST towels by far of any towels I've every had. They do not leave lint all over you after a shower. They dry you off very well. They keep their form after washing/drying. They are the best towels I know of for this price. Get the towels and use the old ones as a shop towel. You will love these.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2021
Author: ANG S.
Title: Plush and very soft
Body: These are the best towels I’ve ever tried! So sof and plush. After two washes I noticed some strings hanging here and there. We’ll see if the hold up. Otherwise. NO complaints. If they hold up after a couple more washes I’m going to buy more!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2020
Author: Adam Seltzer
Title: STANDARD TOWELS
Body: These towels are okay. In just about every department they qualify as 'Medium Quality.' I am happy with the purchase, just not overjoyed. I kind of thought they would have been oversized which was what I was going for. But they are standard size. Not a bad buy at all. Just not an exceptional one.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2020
Author: Grumpy in Maine
Title: Not whimpy skimpy towels.  Very happy with these!
Body: After having some disasters with discount store towels we gave these a try.  Typical ton of lint in the dryer with the first washing, but have proven to be exception quality and we will buy again without hesitation.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 13, 2020
Author: DeltaQuest
Title: Developed dark "smudges" after only 3-4 months of use
Body: About 3-4 months in, they started showing dark "smudges." I tried repeatedly to remove using well-known commercial stain removers without success. Only gotten worse over the next nine months. Now have to replace with different brand, as these have not performed well at all.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 24, 2021
Author: Amy Schooler
Title: Not impressed.
Body: Not impressed at all… They shed for months the colors not pretty is the picture and they’re bumpy and not soft at all as well they’re not that absorbent. I would not recommend them unless you’re using them at the poolside.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 16, 2015
Author: Brian Stone
Title: Great value, but they do shed lint and need to be de-moulted.
Body: These aren't the highest quality towels I've owned, but, for the price, they're tough to beat. I'm very pleased with the fluffyness, and they do dry well.The only negative is that they're definitely not lint-free, which might be one reason why they're cheap. That doesn't mean they're bad quality, it just means they haven't be de-moulted. I've run them through a couple of machine wash/dry cycles with mild detergents, and the lint is noticeably decreasing. I've read that using baking soda in hot water can solve lint problems with new towels, so I'll have to give that a try. With regular washing, it would will probably take four or five cycles to bring it under control.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 20, 2021
Author: Annie
Title: Soft comfy pretty absorbent
Body: So far I am liking them very much!  Haven't had very long though.  They are soft, comfy and absorbent and attractive.  So far I am happy with them!  :)  good size too just right!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 17, 2021
Author: Accardo
Title: Shedding .. still ..
Body: These towels are very soft .. probably thicker than I would like as they tend to take a long time to dry. Our only issue is that after multiple washes they continue to shed .. all over you ..

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 22, 2019
Author: Lifeless Zombies
Title: Better than expected
Body: Better than expected, however will more than likely be replaced within six months to a year. If you are looking for some cheap quick order towels these fit the bill. If you are looking for top of the line softness and absorbent these are not what you want.Size is as described, however I would not call them Luxury spa towels. More like "Towels that get the job done".

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 28, 2021
Author: Hussain Maheryar
Title: Just regular towel that you can buy from Walmart
Body: If you are looking for big standard hotel like towels then skip these. May be they are good for the price but I am a shopper that looks for quality and not the price

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 31, 2020
Author: bill grinley
Title: Towels are tough online- these are great!
Body: Wash them first and they'll be soft, fluffy and absorbent. We line dry everything in Arizona, even in the winter, so the trade off in softness is a given, but not because they're not soft, they are! You won't be disappointed.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2021
Author: W. S. Klavon
Title: Definitely not the same color. These are more of a rust color, especially after i washed them.
Body: I do not recommend at all. These are not a red cranberry, they are a rust burgundy color, which i dislike. Since i washed them, obviously cannot send back. Very expensive for what they are.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2020
Author: Olesya Kozhokaru
Title: Softness is the best
Body: I love this towels I always buy it I love the absorbency softness and thickness it’s a great product the only thing I don’t like it it’s that it gets yellow a little after a while use and white but still have it

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2021
Author: Hollybadger
Title: Nice towels
Body: These are very soft and absorbent. I was expecting a slightly thicker towel based on the product description, but they are still reasonably lofty and a good deal for the price point.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2020
Author: Kim
Title: Best towels I have personally ever owned.
Body: I love these towels. I bought 3 sets (12 total towels). They are probably the best towels I have ever owned. Make me feel like I am in a high end hotel or spa. Will buy again in the future!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 13, 2021
Author: Marie
Title: Very thin
Body: These towels are super thin and and not very absorbent they are definitely not worth the price. They are also very dull in color (I purchased the green) and already appear faded.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 6, 2020
Author: Cheryl Davis
Title: So soft and fluffy!
Body: Saw some negative reviews for these but I don't really understand them. Got these in, washed them. There was *some* fluff in the dryer, but not anything to complain about. Subsequent washings are normal - like any other towels I own. These are a nice size. I ordered them in white. Would definitely order them again.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 31, 2021
Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Skeptical the picture is the actual product that was sent
Body: The towels are fine, but I kind of doubt the towels in the picture and the towels I was sent are the same product. A far more muted and grayer green than is pictured and the towels are not at all fluffy (which I prefer, but something to consider if you're looking for a plusher towel). Have not decided if I will keep or return them.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 23, 2020
Author: Dodge
Title: Absorbency ...
Body: After reading all the great reviews, I was looking forward to getting these towels. I washed them a few times. But the absorbency was not there. The color was beautiful, I also only recieved 3 towels, not 4.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2020
Author: Kindle Customer
Title: Softest towels EVER
Body: I gave these as a gift to son in law for Christmas.  He loves that they are super soft and large.  He hates the old scratchy ones and the ones that slip off the body without drying.  Also much better than gifting something he will not use.  Towels made him happy. Yeah!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2020
Author: Bill
Title: Made Well But...
Body: Towel is two halves stitched together.  I don't know how other towels are made but this became apparent after first washing. Still feels good but I am waiting for the day it separates.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 10, 2020
Author: HollyBee
Title: Luxurious and soft
Body: These towels are very soft, plushy & thick.(I did pre-wash these once & I recommend more to fully remove lint). I'm surprised by a few bad reviews because they're really lovely. Thank you

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 20, 2021
Author: Patrick Evans
Title: Super soft.
Body: Great, soft cotton Turkish towels.  They are really soft even when wet.  If your looking for quality hotel type towels these are pretty damn good.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 26, 2021
Author: Erik Shank
Title: Nice towels!
Body: These towels are really nice, fluffy & soft. I did do what the website said, which is to wash these towels before use in cold water. Grade A towels...

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 29, 2021
Author: Valerie F
Title: Not a true SPA towel. Not very absorbent
Body: I was disappointed in these labeled. As a SPA towel.I expected them to be a little larger than a regular towel and very absorbent.They are pretty towelsI’d say average size and not very absorbent.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 2, 2021
Author: Lori C FL
Title: Pretty. Soft. Absorbent.
Body: Towel snob. Great value thickness and absorbency. Interesting color I haven’t had before. I bought two sets. Slightly oversized which is nice.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 21, 2021
Author: Josie Stoker
Title: Not “luxury” as described. Nice and thick, not very soft though.
Body: They are nice and thick, but not as fluffy or as soft as I expected them to be given the price and the description. I wouldn’t call them “luxury” towels. They feel pretty much like any other towel, just a bit thicker.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 20, 2021
Author: R. Dudley
Title: Great buy
Body: “What did I use it for?”  Duh, bathing, of course.Wonderful towels. Great size and very absorbent. Would whole heartedly recommend them.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 3, 2020
Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Sheds
Body: I reeeally wanted to love these towels. The size, softness, and absorbability were all great! But after 3 months of constant use they are STILL shedding. Not just when I wash them but when I get out of the shower too. I always have little towel hairs all over my body.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2021
Author: Dave from Maine
Title: I am not sure about "Luxury Hotel",
Body: maybe one you stay in by the hour? I washed in cold water before using as recommended and they are no better than something you can buy at Walmart for less money. My dog will love them.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 7, 2021
Author: DEBI M.
Title: Very Soft & Pretty colors
Body: The softness of this towel is Great for my eczema. I wished it more absorbent. The colors are beautiful and full of deep color. Love them

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2019
Author: Nate
Title: Hold up well
Body: I use these for vacation rental properties. They have held up very well for the amount of use they get. With regularly heavy use, I change them out after about 2 years and am happy with that. They don't deteriorate and absorb very well. Have bought over 25 sets of 4 and the quality is consistent. Wish they had hand towels and wash cloths as well!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 5, 2020
Author: John S.
Title: not a good buy you pay for what you get
Body: these towels are the equivalent to targets $8 towels and there not a dark brown and for a bath sheet there a little smaller, no these aren’t luxury towels but luxury towels cost twice to three times as much,

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 17, 2021
Author: Lori Baasch
Title: I’m picky about towels and even I think these towels rock!!
Body: These towels are amazing!! I am super picky about my towels and I was worried about ordering online without seeing them, but these have held up awesome for months now, they are soft and absorbent, and they are just all around perfect!! Absolutely love these! Look no further!!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 13, 2021
Author: Teresa A. Caceres
Title: Good towel, but too narrow
Body: These towels are very soft and absorbent, and very affordable for towels that will last a long time ... I really like them.  The only thing I don't like about them is the width (27").  When I ordered them, I thought 3 inches wouldn't make much of a difference, but I was wrong.  It's surprising what a difference 30" versus 27" makes.  I will stick to 30" wide towels from now on.  But if you don't mind a slightly more narrow towel, I recommend these.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 19, 2019
Author: Crystal
Title: Disappointed
Body: I was very excited about receiving these towels as I had family visiting and wanted towels to match. Was highly disappointed with the first initial wash. Cold water wash and pretty much very low heat. Towels were shedding and did not hold up well. Size was also not as large as expected. Ended up purchasing another set of towels at a nearby Bed Bath and Beyond. Very disappointing.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 26, 2020
Author: Amarie
Title: Discoloring
Body: The towels are nice except mine started to discolor in spots on the towels after one was.Not a good product if after one wash they lose their color.I wouldn’t purchase these.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 26, 2021
Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Not worth it
Body: Soft and rich color but they don’t absorb very well- feel wet as you’re drying off. Only one month and threads are pulling all over.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 27, 2021
Author: Parri Davis
Title: Exactly what I wanted.
Body: What you want, large enough but not huge, soft, absorbent, good looking, thick. But the real plus is how it will dry out again so it does not need to be laundered for every use. I have long hair and I soak a towel. This is a great feature for me.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 16, 2021
Author: Erickson
Title: Much disappointment.
Body: Are these made out of actual garbage? They are in no form or fashion a "luxury towel". The shop rags in my garage scratch less than these towels. If these are "SPA" quality, that spa should either shut down, or reevaluate thier goals. I bought these to replace my old towels from Wal mart, but oddly those are still of better quality. -5 stars; for awful quality, but mainly for being liars.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2020
Author: Lisa Magee
Title: Disappointed!
Body: I’ve bought a couple of sets of these towels and they are fabulous .  I ordered this set from the amazon warehouse and they arrived dirty.  I washed them and the “dirt” did not come out. Plus, one of them has a pull in the middle of the towel.  Very disappointed.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 13, 2020
Author: Daniel
Title: Luxurious,  soft, and great quality!
Body: I was very pleased and impressed with the overall quality, softness, price, and how these towels always have a great smell.  They DON'T stink of have funky smells after getting wet like most every towel out there! Extremely happy with these and will definitely buy more

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2020
Author: Shalom
Title: Plush like a cloud
Body: These towels are great. They feel like a cloud and are perfect for doing what towels are supposed to do.  As adviced on the package,wash them first before you use them and you will be glad you invested in them. I'm definitely recommending them to friends.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 31, 2020
Author: JAG
Title: Very large and soft towel
Body: This towel is larger than expected. Quite thick and soft to touch.  It did leave quite a lot of lint in the dryer filter initially, but I do believe it is starting to improve after about 10 washings so far.  Good value for the quality.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 11, 2021
Author: Susan S
Title: Junk
Body: These towels are complete junk.  On the 5th wash/dry already and nothing but washer And the dryer filter full of lint.  No absorbency at all.  I'd give them half a star if I could, and would definitely return them for full refund if it wasn't too late.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 15, 2021
Author: Allie Bing
Title: Great Towels
Body: These are nice towels for every day use. The quality is almost to the standard of the old Canon towels I had for 30 years.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 20, 2020
Author: CSchwarz
Title: Relatively small and thin
Body: We bought these towels when we had relatives come into town with only a few days of notice. We were hoping their quality would match our regular towels, but these are much thinner and smaller. They're not terrible, but we wouldn't purchase again.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2021
Author: Gypsy J
Title: These are GREAT!
Body: Both after a shower as well as a bed pad at night.  They do an excellent service for both purposes.  I purchased an additional 4 units a month later!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 5, 2021
Author: sam
Title: Returned - Not as pictured
Body: This is far from luxury item. It is a mediocre quality item. Far from shown in the picture. The actual picture is attached.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 9, 2020
Author: BLL
Title: Smaller than Expected.
Body: I was expecting the large hotel type towels. These are normal "Wal Mart" bath towel size. They are much softer though, and they are thick. I was hesitant to buy because people were saying the chemical odor was so bad. Ignore those people, they probably complain because the non GMO gluten in there tofu milk is flavorless. We had no odor, and we do this thing called wash our crap before we use it. Overall satisfied.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 17, 2021
Author: Whitney Wise
Title: Soft, but not great quality
Body: These towels are soft and absorbent. However, after 1 wash and 1 use, the edge is unraveling. I can only imagine what they'll look like in a few weeks.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 14, 2021
Author: Papibighead
Title: I actually expected it to be thicker.
Body: I actually expected it to be thicker. I love thick towels. Makes them feel more luxurious absorbent and comfortable.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 17, 2020
Author: Dakota Grandma
Title: Lint lint lint
Body: A lot of lint came off these towels not what some of the other review said I had to clean the screen twice which amounted to about 4 cups of lint Hopefully next time I wash them the lint goes down or the towels are going to disappear permanently would not recommend

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2021
Author: beth hoffman
Title: Turkish bath towels
Body: A great value for the price, very  soft and absorbs water very well, large but not too large for an family washer, machine washable.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 8, 2021
Author: sugarzaddy
Title: Shed like crazy
Body: Black fuzzies everywhere on everything.  They're kinda small and not that soft.  For $40 bucks....not worth it.  Dont make my mistake and keep shopping for something else.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 28, 2020
Author: Bernard L. Gutnick
Title: Disappointing compared to other Turkish towels
Body: I thought these might be as soft as the Turkish Finest, which are no longer sold.  These are about 70% as thick and not as soft.  I'm not going to return them as the kids don't care as much.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 1, 2020
Author: dvcp
Title: They are OK
Body: So I got these because the reviews say the we’re good but m, honestly, they are not bad, they are ok towels. The ones you but from Walmart for the same price are a far better quality and bigger in size. I’m keeping mine because we needed new towels and they work for your basic needs but definitely going to Walmart next time when I need to buy more bath towels

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 26, 2020
Author: Lori Burch-Markley
Title: Leaves lint all over you
Body: At first glance, these are beautiful towels! But the quality just isn’t there. The color is rich. They’re thick and very soft! Just what I was looking for! I thought! HOWEVER...this is the fourth time that I’ve washed and dried them and they still leave lint all over your wet body. And not a little lint. A LOT of lint! You feel like you need to rinse off and find another towel to dry off with. Hug me disappointment!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 2, 2020
Author: Christa Albert
Title: Could be more absorbing
Body: Nice towels but found they aren’t quite as absorbing as my husband would like.. he actually used 2 towels to dry himself. Maybe after I wash and dry them a few times they will work better?

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 1, 2021
Author: Michelle Kretsinger
Title: Threads loose and snags after first wash!
Body: Wow! What terrible quality for the price. I received these today and washed them prior to use (like the instructions said to do). They look like they are years old already. All the threads and seam stitching are coming out. They aren't very soft and I can't comment on how well they work because I haven't used them! I'm pretty bummed about this purchase.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 11, 2021
Author: Cannon
Title: These are the ones!
Body: If you're like me and do a lot of research; just stop here and buy. They are the best option for conventional, white Turkish cotton towels, and at a good price. Wash and dry on cool settings and wash once before use; that takes care of most negative reviewer's problems.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 10, 2021
Author: Travis B. Moncrief
Title: FAR from Luxury Hotel & Spa Towels
Body: Basically cheap $10 towels from Walmart and work about as good.  Nothing special about or high quality them.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 16, 2021
Author: Kristi W.
Title: Keep searching. Not great!
Body: Soft but poor quality. Already stringing up on the edges. Only second time washing and not holding up well.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 30, 2020
Author: ElusiveWolf
Title: Soft but color is different
Body: They are soft and average thickness. The color doesn’t match the photos. It looks more like the old blue towels of yesteryear not the vibrant blue picture. Otherwise they are very soft.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2019
Author: Rachael Osuna
Title: Not worth the money
Body: I really wanted to love these, but I just don't. We have had them for two weeks, maybe 3-4 washings and they are all pulled making them look old and tacky. I wish they were at least comfy and soft too make up for the low end construction but they aren't. Not worth the money at all! Go to Ross, they always have a better selection

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 12, 2020
Author: Barbara A. Depenbrok
Title: No absorbency
Body: These towels are beautiful and well made, but there is 0% absorbency.  You can lay them in a puddle and they will come up almost dry.  Very disappointing.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 18, 2021
Author: robo6400
Title: Super soft.
Body: I like how soft these are... Not impressed with their absorbency. Hope they get better with time.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 9, 2020
Author: MetaCamellia
Title: Soft, but not thick and fluffy as described!!
Body: These towels are very soft! Regular absorbency, HOWEVER, these towels are NOT THICK!! Don't splurge on these. You are better off paying the same amount for thick fluffy towels from Target or other department stores. I saw white fluffy towels in another review for this product, but these are not the same ones I received. I tried washing and drying them to see if that helped, but no. :( Pretty sad I paid this much for regular towels.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 8, 2020
Author: Partner4Care
Title: Gotta love Towels
Body: Just treat yourself to some new towels.  You are reading this review so you know you want them.  I bought these and they are great.  In fact, I'm just going to take a shower instead of finis...

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 24, 2021
Author: Jenn Short
Title: Thumbs up!
Body: I've had these over a year now.  Zero fraying, soft and fluffy still.  A very good buy,  I have zero regrets.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 19, 2020
Author: iamadam
Title: It's a towel, a wrong color towel.
Body: These are just okay towels, I wouldn't necessarily consider them high quality.  My biggest complaint is the color was not as described.  I ordered the cocoa and they are more like a mustard gold.  I've already washed them so no sending back, but be careful if you are looking to match with your decor.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 23, 2020
Author: Al
Title: Bad quality
Body: I wanted to love these based on other positive reviews but they're horrible. Not thick at all, didn't even dry me off after my shower and I had pink stuff all over me even though I had washed them prior to using. Very disappointing.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 21, 2021
Author: Calli
Title: High Quality Towels
Body: These towels are beautiful! Love the color and are made of high quality material. I'm so glad I purchased them.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 22, 2020
Author: kenzie
Title: ehh
Body: these are good towels but definitely not the softest like what i was looking for, still much better than cheap target towels but if you want super soft i would look somewhere else

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 3, 2021
Author: Barbara Wolf Oneill
Title: Very nice
Body: This is my second time ordering these towels and they work very well and they hold up very well

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2019
Author: CK
Title: Wonderful Towels!
Body: I have had these towels for about four months now, and they have held up well in the wash. With them being pure white, I was worried about them getting stained easily, but I have been able to easily wash out any bits of make up or dirt that blemishes them. The towels are soft and look very nice.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2020
Author: Colin H. Stewart
Title: Luxury?  Pffftt....
Body: They're freaking towels.  While they have held up well in the wash since I've purchased them (about a year), there's nothing here I would consider luxury or even 'Hotel'.  They're average.  I give them three stars based on the durability.  That's about it.  Four stars would be if they had more length and five stars would be if they were soft.  These towels are decent.  Don't expect a luxury feel or size.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2021
Author: JM
Title: Nope..Do not buy...you'll regret.
Body: If you were like me and checked out reviews for these towels while looking for luxury towels...dont buy them. They are horrible, so very small (shrunk in dryer) and are the equivalent to the towels they would have at a motel...do not buy!!!!!!!!! ..terrible

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 19, 2021
Author: Colin Marcom
Title: Amazing towels
Body: Great towels! Bigenoguh to get me all the way dry. Could be fluffier but....I'm not complaining

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 19, 2020
Author: Sharon Barclay
Title: Soft new towels
Body: A friend recommended these towels so I ordered a set.  There were a few thread pulls on 2 of the towels but I clipped and knotted those and have been happy with how soft they are.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 28, 2018
Author: KC of Indy
Title: Just like the ones at the hotels.
Body: Just like the ones at the hotels. They are soft and fluffy. As other have complained, they do lose a lot of fuzz the first washings, but minimal after that. I thought we had a rabbit in the lint trap!!They seem to absorb well and so far minimal shrinking. You have to wash them in cold the first couple of times and dry on low or air dry.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 1, 2020
Author: amazoncrazy
Title: Not a typical size
Body: Kind of a weird size.I do love them but they are a little smaller than expected and they sent me hand towels first. I had to re order. Love the color. Very soft just wish they were bigger

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 17, 2021
Author: Christine
Title: Beautiful to view and use
Body: Love these. The color is as rich as the fabric. When laundering I didn’t find them to take any longer to dry than my other towels. They are super absorbent and feel luxurious. I will buy again.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 6, 2021
Author: Amazon Customer
Title: You are right!  They are better Hotel quality,
Body: Love them it is great to dry off in a steamy bathroom and only have to use one towel.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 20, 2020
Author: Kindle Customer
Title: Perfect
Body: These towels are exactly what I was looking for. I didn't want a bulky towel and these are perfect. Amazingly, they match up perfectly with some towels I already had. I couldn't be happier.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2020
Author: Karolina J.
Title: SOFT BUT DOES NOT ABSORB
Body: These towels may be soft but that Is not the function of a towel. I literally have to dry myself down several times and the water is still not fully absorbed. If you want softness then go ahead but I would recommend something else if you want a fully functioning towel.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2019
Author: T. Beaulieu
Title: Great value. Absorbent.
Body: For the money, these are great towels. They are nice enough, but not luxury towels. I'm happy with the purchase and was able to replace aged, ugly towels. Been washing them separately to try to keep them white.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2020
Author: Brad
Title: Best towels
Body: I bought these and liked them so much I bought another 4 and threw out all my other towels. Wash before using to “de-lint” them. I only buy white and I bleach them every time I wash them. They’re soft, durable, well made and I highly recommend them.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 22, 2020
Author: She
Title: Quality Bath Towels
Body: Used them for the first time today, I like that these Turkish towel are very soft, absorbent and thick I'm pleased with my purchase.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 4, 2021
Author: ShyGal
Title: NOT good quality
Body: Bought these after reading all the “good” reviews...I washed them and just after THE FIRST WASH, they started to fray. Unacceptable! Returned!!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 21, 2020
Author: Damian
Title: Worth your money
Body: Will purchase again. Very soft, light shedding when washing. no noticeable thread pulling after several washes. Nice and thick, good absorbency. Over all great towel.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 20, 2021
Author: sivmem
Title: You will love these
Body: I absolutely love these towels. They are large, absorbent and feel luxurious.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 20, 2020
Author: Peter Lopilato
Title: Returning these
Body: First you should know I am not picky about towels. Our current towels are 10-years-old from Wal-Mart. So when I decided to upgrade, I wanted to feel that I was really getting something better and thicker. These are just so-so. Not terribly fluffy. They're going back.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 8, 2020
Author: Delores
Title: Quality disappointing
Body: Lost some of beauty with 1st washing and big threads on edges came loose.  Very nice towels on arrival just not put together well.  I have had other towels of much better quality.

Once we moved and no longer need the "mood" i washed these towels.  No fraying, no excessive lint, just beautiful towels.  I will enjoy offering these towers to my guests to use.

Author: Cece
Title: Pretty good towels, but not what you'd get at a luxury spa...
Body: I wanted to love these towels; they are okay.  When I see the words "luxury" and "spa" together, I think very high quality.  I think falling asleep on plush, warm, soft towels in the spa's Quiet Room.  I think "proud to give this to my pickiest guest for a shower."However, after you launder these towels, they will still fuzz on you and your bathroom floor.  You'll see some random loose strings along the side of the towel, which you'll just need to snip.For the price, they are pretty good and they'll work just fine for everyday bathing needs.  They are not fancy.  If you're looking for a WOW factor that is *real luxury spa*, go to Bloomingdales and get their towels, which are more than $75 each.

Title: upon first look they are flimsy & not "puffy" like pictured. I took a small portion of the ...
Body: I was INCREDIBLY excited to receive these towels.  I opened them as soon as the package arrived.  However, upon first look they are flimsy & not "puffy" like pictured.  I took a small portion of the towel out of the bag & they're pretty rough and thin for what you pay! I've seen/felt better towels at grocery stores.. I'm not a big fan of walmart due to some of their practices, but the $5 towels we purchased from there are much softer & of better quality than these. These definitely aren't the worse towels, but certainly don't live up to their "luxury" title & "luxuriously soft" description.  And maybe they get better with washings, but I'm not going to take that chance & not be able to return them.  Sending them back.

Author: Iona
Title: They're NOT on sale
Body: Don't be fooled by the crossed-out price. They always cost $39.99. If I had realized that, I wouldn't have bought them. They're perfectly satisfactory for $10 towels, but I thought I was getting $20 towels on sale, and I was expecting higher quality.What's great about them: They're absorbent and VERY soft.What's not great about them: I'd like them to be both bigger and thicker. It's clear from the floods of thread they lost during the first few uses/washes they're not going to last that long.It's all about expectations. Just know that you're buying $10 towels, not $20 towels on sale, and I think you'll be happy with your purchase.

Title: Luxury (not) Towel
Body: I gave this towel two stars not because they were not good towels, but more because they did not live up to their description as Luxury Hotel & Bath Spa type towels.  We were disappointed to find that these towels were not thick and luxurious as described.  They were thin and ordinary (under 2" in thickness when folded).  If you are looking for an ordinary everyday towel, then this is your towel.  But if you are in the market for a thick, soft towel to display on a shelf or make you feel like you are at a high end spa...then this is not the towel for you.

Author: Kimberly
Title: A real review.
Body: I really don't see the big deal about these towels. They are certainly not the kind of quality that some of these reviews are touting. It's listings like this that make me think a lot of reviews are fake. The towels aren't bad, but they're not anything like the top quality, super plush towels you find at a great hotel or spa. They also aren't huge like some are insisting. They are regular sized bath towels. And they peel. One washing and they're already showing signs of peeling. You can get something very similar at Target for $7 each. All in all, they're fine and I'll keep them in the guest bath but they're certainly not the luxurious bath sheets that some of these reviews claim.

Author: Maria Hopkins
Title: These are adequately comfortable
Body: These are the most comfortable towels I've had in years, but I'm more than slightly annoyed that after nearly ten washes they are still bleeding dye (a tiny bit, but still - I can't wash them with anything except my brown towels) and linting everywhere, constantly (they still turn the entire lint tray red in my dryer). After so many washes, and in only cold water at that, you would think they would have stopped dropping loose little balls of fuzz, but apparently not.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 2, 2017
Author: Fun Dad
Title: and was excited to receive them because all my shower towels are old and smell like mildew. This set looks great and feels great
Body: I was given this set as a gift by a friend, and was excited to receive them because all my shower towels are old and smell like mildew.  This set looks great and feels great. But I'm disappointed by the absorption. The towel seems to just spread the water instead of absorb the water. I have to resort to air drying my body because these towels do a poor job. I've read all the positive reviews so maybe I just got a bad batch. Whatever. I'm now searching for a brand that actually DRIES me!

Body: I love these towels, I've been using them for a couple of weeks before reviewing them so that I could give a fair assessment as I hate thick fluffy towels which do not absorb water properly. But these were great, they were thick, fluffy and super absorbent. I love them. Do note that they are big, but not huge.

Title: It's so SOFT and COZY
Body: Upon arrival, I immediately noticed the softness and weight of these towels. I thought let's see if they survive the SPIN CYCLE and the HELLISH HEAT of ”THE DRYER.” I'm very pleased to announce they survived and didn't shrink or shed towel lint. I'll be ordering another 4!!!

Title: Big but almost worthless.
Body: After washing and drying a few times they are still big and fluffy. My only gripe is they dont dry you off. They are not absorbent by any stretch of the imagination.  I thought after a few cycles they would work right but alas this was not the case.

Author: Nelson Troyano
Title: Excelente Calidad buena relación Precio-Valor
Body: Muy suaves y buena absorción, mi esposa esta muy impresionada con la suavidad de estas toallas, hasta ahora me parece una buena inversión, super importante el tema de seguir las instrucciones y lavarlas antes de usar, como ellos indican, el primer lavado en agua fría, solo jabón, nada de suavizantes, ciclo de algodón, y el secado ciclo en frio o colgarlas al aire libre, un tip que usamos para mejorar el secado fue al momento de iniciar el ciclo de secar introducir 3 bolas de tenis, las toallas quedaron perfectas y el color sin ningún cambio.  Mas adelante actualizare con la opinión de mis hijos y luego de varios ciclos de lavado.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 1, 2021
Author: Amazoner
Title: After 7 years, these are still wonderfully soft and plush
Body: I got a few of these towels 7 years ago, and they're still in mint condition. These are very soft, plush, and thick. The blue color is lovely. Both me and my husband have sensitive skin, so we're extra picky about the quality of fabrics for towels, clothing, bed sheets, and such. These have held up so much better than the more expensive towels I got at Bed, Bath, and Beyond.
